versiculos.texto: ‘Arani, Tseti, 'Enuxi,
Kainahani, Marareri, Kareri,
'Enuki, Matusareni, Rameki,
Nuhexi.
Nuhexi nivennama: Tsemi, Kami meta Kapeti. Kapeti nivennama mepitetetewakai: Kumexi, Makuki, Marahi, Kawani, Tuwari, Metseki meta Tiratsi.
Kumexi nivennama: 'Atsikenatsi, Xipati meta Tukaxima.
Kawani nivennama: 'Eritsaha, Taritsi, Tsipire meta Xuranini.
Kami nivennama mepitetewakai: Kutsi, Mitsirahini, Puti meta Kanani.
Kutsi nivennama mepitetewakai: Tsewa, Kawira, Tsaweta, Xahama meta Tsaweteka. Xakama nivennama mekanakine: Tsawaha meta Renani.
Kutsi Nimiruri paapaya kanayani, mikitewi kwinimieme reuyutamieweti kanayani 'ena kwiepa.
Mitsirahini wa'ukiyari kanayani rureutsixi, 'anameutsixi, rehawitsixi, natuhitsixi,
meta paturutseutsixi, katsurukitsixi meta katuritsixi miki piritsiteutsixi wa'ukiyarima mepaki.
Kanani Tsiruni paapaya kanayani matiarieya, meta Heti,
meta nepixiiyarimamatikai kewutseutsixi, 'amuxeutsixi, keriketseutsixi,
heweutsixi, 'aratseutsixi, tsineutsixi,
'axiwareutsixi, tsemareutsixi meta kamatitsixi.
Tsemi nivemama: 'Erami, 'Atsuxi, 'Axipatsari, Ruri meta 'Arami. 'Arami nivemama: 'Utsi, Huri, Ketexi meta Metseki.
'Axipatsari Tseraki kanipaapayatikaitini, mikita 'Evexi paapaya patia.
Meta 'Evexi yuhutame yuniwema kaniwarayexelya: mexiakame Pereki pititewakai, miki 'utinuiwaku teiteri yuxaita memeukuyaxixiaki yayupapaimeti. Pereki mutaya pititewakai Kutani.
Kutani 'Arimurari paapaya patia meta Tserepi, Katsaxi-Maweti, Yeraki,
Harurani, 'Utsari, Rikira
'Uwari, 'Awimaheri, Tsawa,
'Upixi, Kawira meta Kuwawi. 'Iki yunaiti Kutani mekaninivemamattini.
Tsemi, 'Axipatsari, Tseraki
'Evexi, Pereki, Xehu,
Tseruki, Nakuxi, Teraki
meta 'Apirami, 'Apirahami mititewatatsiere.
'Apirahami nivemama: 'Itsahaki meta 'Itsimaheri.
'Itsimaheri nivemama: Newayuti mexiakameya patia, Tseraxi, 'Ariweheri, Miwitsani,
Mitsima, Rumaha, Matsa, Haraha, Temaha,
Ketuxi, Napitsi meta Tserema. Miki mepihiki 'Itsimaheri nivemama.
'Apirahami nivemama Tsetura muwarayexei 'iparewiwameya 'iyayatti matia mepihiki: Tsimirani, Kutsani, Merani, Mariyani, 'Itsiwaki meta Tsuhaki. Kutsani nivemama: Tsawa meta Rerani.
Mariyani nivemama: 'Epa, 'Epexi, Kanuki, 'Awiraha meta 'Eriraha. Yunaiti miki Tsetura nivemama mepihiki.
'Apirahami meta 'Itsahaki paapaya kanayani. 'Itsahaki nivemama mekanakine 'Etsahu meta 'Izaheri.
'Etsahu nivemama: 'Eripaxi, Xehueri, Kehutsi, Karani meta Kure.
'Eripaxi nivemama: Temani, 'Umaxi, Tsepuhu, Katani meta Kenatsi, Timina meta 'Amareki.
Xehueri nivemama: Nakati, Tsera, Tsama meta Mitsaha.
Tsehixi nivemama: Rutani, Tsuwari, Tsiwehuni, 'Ahana, Ritsuni, 'Eteszi meta Ritsani.
Rutani nivemama: Huri meta Humani. Rutani Timina pitaruyatikai.
Tsuwari nivremama: 'Ariwani, Manakati, 'Ewari, Tsepuhu meta 'Unami. Tsiwehuni nivremama: 'Ayaha meta 'Ahana.
'Ahana nu'aya kanayani Ritsuni. Ritsuni nivremama: 'Amirani, 'Etsiwani, 'Itirani meta Kerani.
'Etsexi nivremama: Wirani, Tsawani meta Yakani. Ritsani nivremama: 'Utsi meta 'Arahani.
Te'aitamete 'ena menika'uxa 'Erumi kwieyaritisie mekateniuta'aita, 'akuxi 'ixaheritsixi ti'aitame mekahexeiyakaku: Wera Wehuxi nu'aya, kiekarieya Rinawa katinitewakaitini.
Kepauka mumi Wera, 'utimanata katiniuta'aita Kuwawi Tsera nu'aya, Wutsira kiekametiti.
Kepauka Kuwawi mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Kutsani, miki Temani kwieyaritisie pikiekametikai.
Kepauka Kutsani mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Harari Werari nu'aya, miki mariyanitsixi kaniwara'iwa Muhawi kwieyaritisie. Kiekarieya katinitewakaitini 'Awiu.
Kepauka Harari mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Tsamira, Matsireka kiekame.
Kepauka Tsamira mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Tsahuri, Xekuwuti mirakutewatsie kiekame 'Eupirate hatuxameyari tetsita.
Kepauka Tsahuri mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Wahari-Kanani 'Akuwuxi nu'aya.
Kepauka Wahari-Kanani mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Harari. Kiekarieya katinitewakaitini Pahu, 'iyaya Mehitaweri pititewakai, Matereri nu'aya meta Metsawi teukarieya.
Kepaukata Harari mumi, 'Erumi kwieyaritisie mekateniuta'aita 'iki 'itsikate: Timina, 'Ariwa, Keteti,
'Ahuriwama, 'Eraha, Pinuni,
Kenatsi, Temani, Miwitsaxi,
Makirieri meta 'Irami. 'Iki 'itsikate mekanakine 'Erumi kwieyaritisie.
'Ixaheri niwemama mekanihikitini: Xuweni, Tsimehuni, Rewi, Kura, 'Itsakaxi, Tsawuruni,
Rani, Kutse, Wenikamini, Nepitahari, Kahari meta 'Atsexi.

Kura niwemama: 'Exi, 'Unani meta Tseraxi. 'Iki meyuhalkame 'uka kananeu tewiyari Tsuhaki niweya hetsie puwarayexei. 'Exi Kura pimatiarieyatikai, miki Yawé kemikatinake pitiuyuri, hiki Yawé tukarieya pinawairi.
Tamaxi, Kura mu'eya, tiri yuhutame kaniwarayexeiya Kura hetsiemieme: Paretsi meta Tsera. Hiki meyunaiti Kura meyu'auxiwime kaniwarayexeiya tiri.
Paretsi niwemama: Ketsiruni meta Kamuri.
Tsera nivermama meyunaiti meyu'auxiviti mepaki: Tsimiri, 'Etani, Hemani, Karikuri meta Raxira.
Karimi nu'aya 'Akaxi kanayani, tatsiari miki 'axamitiuyuri 'Ixaheri hetsiemieme Kakaiyari 'aitsikaya mika'anu'eni naime kememiteka'unakekai.
Etani nu'aya 'Atsariyaxi kanayani.
Ketsiruni nivermama: Kerameri, Xami meta Keruwahi.
Xami 'Aminarawi paapaya kanayani, mikita Nahatsuni paapaya kanayani, Kura nuiwarimama wa'ukiyari matia.
Nahatsuni Tsarimuni pupaapayatikai, mikita Puhuxi paapaya patia.
Puhuxi 'Uweri paapaya patia, mikita 'Itsahi paapaya patia.
Kitsahi nu'aya mexiakame patia 'Eriyawi, hutarieka mieme 'Awinarawi, hairieka mieme Tsimaha,
naurieka mieme Natanaheri, 'auxivirieka mieme Xarahi,
'ataxewirieka mieme 'Utseni, 'atahutarieka mieme Rawiri.
Wa'iwama 'ukari mekatenitetewakatini Tsariwiya meta 'Awikahiri. Tsariwiya nivermama meyuhaikati mekanakine: 'Awitsahi, Kuhawi meta 'Atsaheri.
'Awikahiri Amatsaha mannarya kanayani Ketexi matia memeyexei 'itsimaheri teviyari.
Karewi Ketsiruni nu'aya tiri kaniwarayexeiya yu'ittama 'Atsuwa meta Kerihuti wahamatia. 'Iki nivemama mekanakine: Ketsexi, Tsuwawi meta 'Axiruni.
Kepauka 'Atsuwa mumi, Karewi 'Epirata kaniutiwitini, miki matiata yuniwe Kuxi kanayexeiya.
Kuxi 'Urihi paapaya kanayani, mikita Wetsareri paapaya kanayani.
Kepauka Ketsiruni haika teviyari wiyari mexeiyakai, Makixi nu'aya kaniutiwitini, Karaha paapaya, miki matia kaneyexeiya yuniwe Tsekuwi.
Tsekuwi Yahixi paapaya kanayani, miki xeiteviyari heimana haika kiekariyari katinipinieyatikaitini Karaha kwieyaritsie.

Peru Ketsuxi meta 'Arami mekaninawairieni Yahixi kiekariteya meta Kenati kiekariteya, metatsiere kiekarite wa'aurie mananetikatei. Naiti munawayarie kanayani haika teviyari kiekarite. Miki meyunaiti Makixi nuiwarimama mepihikitikai, Karaha paapaya.
'Arike Ketsiruni 'umiku Karewi-Epirata mirakutewatsie, 'iyaya 'Awiyaxi, 'Atsuxi kanayexeiya, mikita Tekuha paapaya kanayani.
Kerameri nivemama, Ketsiruni matiarieya, mekanakine: matiarieya Xami, Wuna, 'Ureni, 'Utseni meta 'Ahiyaxi.
Kerameri tawari xeime kaniutiwitini, miki katinitewakatini 'Atara. Miki 'Unami mamaaya kanayani.
Xami nivemama, Kerameri matiarieya, mekanakine: Mahatsi, Kamini meta 'Ekexi.
'Unami nivemama: Tsamahi meta Yara. Tsamahi nivemama: Narawi meta 'Awitsuxi.
'Awitsuxi 'iyaya katinitewakatini 'Awikahiri, miki hamatia 'Akiwani kanayexeiya meta Muriri.
Narawi nivemama: Tsereri meta 'Apahini. Tsereri kaniumini tiri kawarayexeiyaweti.
'Apahini nu'aya 'Itsi kanayani, 'Itsi nu'aya Tsetsani kanihikitikaitini, Tsetsani nu'aya 'Akirahi kanayani.
Yara nivemama, Tsamahi 'iwaya, mekanihikitini: Ketexi meta Kunatani. Ketexi kaniumini tiri kawarayexeiyaweti.
Kunatani nivemama: Pereti meta Tsatsa. 'Iki mekanakine Kerameri nuiwarimama.
Tsetsani 'ukitsi pikawarayexei 'ukari puwarayexei pita, meta xeime 'uki wairiyarika ti'uximayatame pexeiyakai 'ekipitutanaka Yaxika titewakame.
Miki xeime yuniwe kaniwittitani, miki 'Atahi namaaya kanayani.
'Atahi Natani paapaya kanayani, Natani Tsawari paapaya patia,
Tsawari 'Epirari pupaapayatikai, 'Epirari 'Uweri pupaapayatikai,
'Uweri Kehu pupaapayatikai, Kehu 'Atsariyaxi pupaapayatikai,
'Atsariyaxi Heretsi pupaapayatikai, Heretsi 'Eratsa pupaapayatikai,
'Eratsa Tsitsimahi pupaapayatikai, Tsitsimahi Tsaruni pupaapayatikai,
Tsaruni Kekamiyaxi pupaapayatikai, meta Kekamiyaxi 'Eritsama pupaapayatikai.
Karewi niwemama, Kerameri 'iwaya, mekanakine: matiarimieme Metsaha, miki Tsipi paapaya matia, meta Maretsa, Hewuruni paapaya matia.
Hewuruni niwemama: Kure, Tapuhaki, Xekeni metastiere Tsema.
Tsema Xahami 'ukiyarieya patia, mikita Kuxukuhani paapaya patia. Xekeni Tsamahi paapaya patia.
Tsamahi Mahuni paapaya patia. Mahuni Wetsuxi paapaya patia.
'Epa, Karewi ti'uximayatsiriwame 'iyayatti matia, Karani mamaaya kanayani meta Mutsa, Katsetsi meta. Karani Katsetsi paapaya patia.
Yarahi niwemama: Xekeni, Kutani, Ketsani, Pereti, 'Epa meta Tsakapi.
Mahaka, Karewi ti'uximayatsiriwame 'iyayatti matia, Tsevexi mamaaya kanayani meta Tirikana,
metatsiere Tsakapi mamaaya kanayani, Marimana paapaya matia, metatsiere Maka Tsewa mamaaya patia, miki Makiwena paapaya matia meta Kiweya. Metatsiere Karewi xeime 'uka kanayexeiya 'Akatsa titewakame.
Miki mekanakine Karewi nuiwarimama. Kuxi niwemama, 'Epirata matiarieya, mekanakine: Tsuwari, Kiriati-Yeharini paapaya matia,
Tsarima, Wereni paapaya, meta Karepi, Weti-Karexi paapaya matia.
Tsuwari niwemama, Kiriati-Yeharini paapaya, mekanakine: Haruhe, hixiata me'ati manakattisixi,
Kiriati-Yeharini tiriyamama, 'tiritatsixi, putitsixi, tsunattisixi meta mitsirahitsixi, miki wahetsie meglyeki tsurattisixi meta 'etsitahuritsixi.
Tsarima nivemama: Wereni, netupatari, 'Ateruti-Weti-Kuhawi, hixiata me'ati manakattisixi, tsurehitsixi,
metatsiere te'utiwamete Kawetsi memitamakai, miki megihikitikai, tiratetutsixi, tsimatetutsixi meta tsukatehutsixi. 'Iki mepaki kenitsixi, Kamati nuiwarimama, Xekawi tiriyamama wapaapa.

'Iki megihiki Rawiri nivemama memutinunuiwaxi Hewuruni kiekariyaritsie: 'Aminuni matiarieya kanayani 'Akinuhani hetsiemieme Ketsireri kiekame, hutarieka mieme, Tanieri 'Awikahiri hetsiemieme Kazimeri kiekame,
hairieka mieme, 'Awitsaruni Mahaka hetsiemieme, ti'aitame Tarimahi nu'aya Ketsuxi miti'aitametikai, naurieka mieme, 'Aruniyaxi Kakiti hetsiemieme,
'auxiwirieka mieme, Tsepatiyaxi 'Awitari hetsiemieme, 'ataxewirieka mieme, 'Itirehani 'Ekira hetsiemieme, mikitatsiere Rawiri mi'iyayatikai.

Miki meyu'ataxewiti mekaniutinunuiva Hewuruni, kepauka mana miti'aitakai 'atahuta wiyari heimana 'ataxewime metseri. Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsieta katiniuta'aita xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana haika wiyari.
Manata mekaniutinunuiva Tsimaha, Tsuwawi, Natani meta Tsarumuni, miki Wetitsawe hetsie mepimiemetetikai, 'Amiheri nu'aya.
Metatsiere puwarayexei Twikaxi, 'Eritsama, 'Eripereti,
Nuka, Nepeki, Kapiha,
'Eritsama, 'Erihara meta 'Eripereti, yunaiti mepuyu'atanauka.
Yunaiti miki Rawiri mepiniwemama, meka'iniariti te'uximayatamete 'iitamamatiti memaki wahetsie niwarayexei. Wa'iwa 'uka pititewakai Tamaxi.
'Iki mephiki Tsarumuni nuiwarimama te'aitamete memaki: Xuwuhani, 'Awiyaxi, 'Atsa, Kutsapati,
Kurani, 'Ukutsiyaxi, Kuhatsi,
'Amatsiyaxi, 'Atsariyaxi, Kutani,
'Akatsi, 'Etsekiyaxi, Manatsexi,
'Amuni meta Kutsiyaxi.
Kutsiyaxi nivemama mekanakine: Mexiakame Kuhanahani, hutarieka mieme Kuhatsimi, hairieka mieme Tserekiyaxi, naurieka mieme Tsaruni.
Kuhatsimi niwemama mekanakine Kekuniyaxi meta Tserekiyaxi:
Kekuniyaxi niwemama, muwiyarie tewa mehanie, mekanakine: Tsaratheri,
Marikirani, Perahiyaxi, Tsenatsaxi, Kekamiyaxi, Hutsama meta Nerawiyaxi.
Perahiyaxi niwemama mekanakine: Tsuruwaweri meta Tsimi. Tsuruwaweri niwemama mekanakine: Metsurani meta Kananiyaxi, wa'iwa 'uka Tserumiti pititewakai.
Meta 'iki kaniwarayexeiya meyu'auxiwime: Katsuwa, 'Uheri, Werekiyaxi, Katsariyaxi meta Yutsawi-Ketseri.
Kananiyaxi nuiwarimama mekanakine: Peratiyaxi meta Kitsariyaxi, metatsiere Xepahiyaxi niwemama nuiwarimama mepaki, meta 'Axinahani niwemama, meta 'Awiriyaxi niwemama metatsiere Tsekaniyaxi niwemama.
Tsekaniyaxi nuiwarimama mepaki Tsemahiyaxi meta niwemama: Katuxi, 'Ikahari, Wariyaxi, Nehariyaxi meta Tsapati, miki yunaiti mepuyu'ataxewi.
Nehariyaxi niwemama mepaki: 'Erihuhenahi, 'Etsekiyaxi meta 'Atsirikani, miki yunaiti mepuyuhaika.
'Erihuhenahi niwemama mepaki: Hurawiyaxi, 'Eriyatsiwi, Perahiyaxi, 'Akuwi, Kuhanahani, Rerahiyaxi meta 'Ananihi, miki meyunaiti mepi'atahuta.
Kura nuiwarimama mekanihikitini: Paretsi, Ketsiruni, Karimi, Kuxi meta Tsuwari.
Xehahiyaxi Tsuwari nu'aya Yakati paapaya kanayani, meta Yakati 'Akumahi paapaya kanayani meta Rakari. Miki mekanakine tsurattisixi nuiwariyari.
'Etami nivemama menakine: Ketsireri, 'Itsima meta 'Iwatsi. Wa'iwa 'uka katinitewakatitni Katsereripuni.
Metatsiere nivemama mekanakine: Penuheri, Keruxi paapaya, meta 'Etsexi, Kutsa paapaya. Miki mekanakine Kuxi nuiwarimama, 'Epirata matiarieya, Wereni paapaya.
'Atsuxi, Tekuha paapaya yuhutame 'ukarawetsixi kaniwarutiwiini, Hera meta Nahara.
Nahara 'Akutsani mamaaya patia meta Hepexi, Temeni meta 'Akatsitari. Miki Nahara nivemama mekanakine.
Hera nivemama mekanakine: Tsereti, Yetsukaxi meta 'Etinahani.
Kuhutsi 'Anuwi 'ukiyarieya patia, meta Tsuwewa, metatsiere 'Akaxikeri tiriyamama Haruni nu'aya.
Kawetsi waikawa rexeiyati patia 'iwamama kememika'anekai. Kepauka mamaaya miyamitteriwaxi, mipai kaniutayini: «Netiuka'eniwati nepitiniuvexi».

Hiki Kawetsi 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya mipai pitiutawawiri: «'Aixia keneneyurieka, kwie 'eyeume keneneyetuiri, keneneparewieka, 'axami'anetsie keneneuxina nemikatiluka'eniwaniki». Kakaiyari yakatinivyurieni kemititawawiri.
Keruwi, Tsuka 'iwaya, Mekixi paapaya kanayani, mikita Mekixi 'Etsituni paapaya kanayani.
'Etsituni Weti-Xapaha paapaya kanayani meta Patsehaki metatsiere Tekina, 'Ixi-Nakatsi paapaya matia. Miki mekanakine Xekaha kiekatari.

Kenatsi niwemama mekanakine: 'Utunieri meta Tserahiyaxi. 'Utunieri niwemama mekanakine: Katati meta Mehunutahi, miki 'Upira paapaya matia. Tserahiyaxi Kuhawi paapaya patia, mikita Ke-Karitsini kiekatari wapaapa patia, mana kiekatari tepiaki te'uximayatamete memihikitikaiki.
Karewi niwemama Kepune nu'aya mekanakine: 'Ixi, 'Eraha meta Nuhani. 'Eraha Kenatsi paapaya kanayani.
Yarereri niwemama mekanakine: Tsipi, Tsipa, Tiriyaxi meta 'Atsareri.
'Etsitiraxi niwemama mekanakine: Ketexi, Mereri, 'Epexi meta Karuni. Xewiti Mereri 'iyaya —hetsiena kaniwarayexeiya: Miriyami, Tsamahi meta 'Itsiwa, 'Etsitemuha paapaya matia—

miki Witiha katinitewakatimi Parahuni nu'aya. Xewitita Mereri 'iyaya Kura nuiwarieyatsie kanimiemetikaitini, miki hamatia kaniwarayexeiya: Kereri, Keruxi paapaya, Hewexi, Tsuku paapaya, meta Kekutiberi, Tsanuha paapaya.
Kehira, Karimi tewiyari, meta 'Etsitemuha, Mahaka kiekame, miki Huriyaxi 'iyaya nivemama mekanakine, tatsiari, Nakani 'iwaya 'uka.
Tsimuni nivemama mekanakine: 'Aminuni, Xina, Weni-Kanani meta Tiruni. 'Itsi nivemama mekanakine: Tsuketi meta Weni-Tsuketi.
Tseraxi nuiwarimama Kura nu'aya mekanakine: 'Exi, Rekaha paapaya, Raraha, Maretsa paapaya, meta memite'uximaya rinutsie Weti-'Atsiweya kiekariyaritsie nepitiiriyamama,

metatsiere Tsera nuiwarimama mepaki Kuhakini, meta Kutsewa kiekariyaritsie kiekatari, Kuhatsi kiekatari meta Tsarape kiekatari, miki (mipai paine 'utiarika meripai mieme) kename meka'akunuaxiawaweti Werentisie 'ukarawetsixi muhawitsixi mewarutiwiti.
Miki mekanihikitikaitini 'iwewamete Netahini memilikiekataritikai meta Kerera, mana mekaniyuhayewa ti'aitame mete'uximayatsirieti.
Tsimehuni nuiwarimama mekanakine: Nemuheri, Kamini, Kariwi, Tsera meta Tsahuri.
Tsahuri nu'aya kanayani: Tsaruni, Tsaruni nu'aya Miwitsani kanayani, Miwitsani nu'aya Mitsima kanayani.
Mitsima nuiwarimama mekanakine: Kamuheri, Tsakuxi meta Tsimi.

Tsimi tamamata heimana 'ataxewime yuniwema 'ukitsi kaniwarayexelya meta me'ataxewime 'ukari, peru 'iwamama 'etsiwa xelkia mepiwarayexei tieri, 'ayumieme watiiriyama waikawa mepikalutamirixi Kura nuiwarimama kememiyi.
Weritsewa mekanikuyaxe meta Murara, Katsaxi-Tsuhari,
Wiriha, 'Etseni, Turari,
Wetuheri, Kuxima, Tsikiraki,
Weti-Marikawuti, Katsaxi-Tsutsini, Weti-Wirahi meta Tsakarahini. Miki wakiekarite kanayani kepaukake Rawiri mitiuta'aitaxi.
Wakiekari 'etsimiyeyeu kanayani 'Etami, 'Ahini, Ximuni, Tukeni meta 'Atsani —naiti 'auxiwiti patia—,
meta 'akuxi 'iya kiekari 'aurie mananetikatei metatsiere Wahari kwieyaritsiepaiti. Miki wakie kanayani, kenaine kememiteheukumuiwa xapayari.
Metsuwawi, Kamireki, Kutsiyaxi 'Amatsiyaxi nu'aya,
Kuheri, Kehu Kutsiwiyaxi nu'aya, Tserahiyaxi nu'aya, 'Atsiheri nu'aya,
'Erihuhenahi, Kakuwa, Yetsukahiyaxi, 'Atsahiyaxi, 'Arieri, Ketsimiheri, Wenahiyaxi,
Tsitsa Tsipi nu'aya, 'Aruhuni nu'aya, Kerahiyaxi nu'aya, Tsimiri nu'aya, Tsemahiyaxi nu'aya:
'Iki meyunaiti memanuyyetei mekanihikitikaitini yutiiriyama wabetsie. Watiiriyama waikawa memutamirixiki,
mekanekine Keruxi manayenieretsie, mayeweri tau manatineika hepatsie, 'ixa meheuwautikaiti yutewama wabetsiemieme.
Mana mekanitaxeiya 'ixa 'aixia 'aneneme waikawame, kwie 'eyeukame, kayuwati 'umakaku. Mana mekanititekaitini meripaiti Kami nuiwarimama.

Memanuyyetei 'ari memutiteriwarie meniu'axiani 'Etsekiyaxi ti'aitakaku Kura kwieyaritsie. Mekaniwarutakwini Kami nuiwarimama meta kii kepaimeme memukaxei naime mekaniuti'una. Mana waikawa 'ixa muxuawekaiki watewama wahetsiemieme, mana mekaniuyuhayewa, hiki 'akuxi mana mekanekuteni.

'Auxiwime tsienituyari kuyaxi, Tsimehuni nuiwarimama memilikiikai, meniwani'akaitini Peratiyaxi, Nehariyaxi, Xepahiyaxi meta 'Utsiheri, 'Itsi niwemama mekanihikitikaitini, Tsehixi hiriyaritsie mekanekine.
Mewarukwika 'Amareki teiterimama memutawikwekai mana memukutekai, mana mekaniuyuhayewa, hiki 'akuxi mana mekanetiteni.

Xuweni nuiwarimama, 'Ixaheri matiarieya. Xuweni 'Ixaheri pumatiarieyatikai, peru xapatsie mipai pikatiu'utsie kememite'ununuiwaxi memaka'utiarietsie yu'ukiyari ti'uximayatsiriwame 'iyayatti matia hamatia mukahuiki. Matiari miemettii heitserie kemirexeiyakai Kutse niwemama wahetsie pita pitunakixi 'Ixaheri nu'aya.
Kaniyuritini Kura matsi waikawa mariweti kanayani kememika'anekai 'iwamama, metsi mitiwa'altia kanayani, peru matiari miemettii heitserie kemirexeiyani Kutse hetsie pita pitunakixi.
Xuweni niwemama 'Ixaheri matiarieya, mekanakine: Kanuki, Paru, Ketsiruni meta Karimi.
Kuheri nuiwarimama kemenite'ununuiwaxi mekanihikitini: Tsemahiyaxi, Kuki, Tsimi,
Mikahiyaxi, Xehahiyaxi, Wahari
meta Wehera, miki xuwenitsixi wa'ukiyari matia. 'Iki 'imatirieka mieme kanelihana Tikirati-Piretsexi, ti'aitame 'Atsiriya kiekame.
'Iki mekanakine Wehera maremama, kemire'uxa kemenite'ununuiwaxi xapayaritsie: Keyeri manuyekatei matia, Tsakariyaxi
meta Wera 'Atsatsi nu'aya, Tsema nu'aya, Kuheri nu'aya. Wehera 'Aruhexi kiekame kanayani, kwieya 'akaniyeukaitini Newu paiti meta Wahari-Mekuni.
Tau manatineika hepatsie makumawe maye'atika paiti piye'atikatei kwieya 'Eupirate haa manuyekatsie, tewamama waikawa memuyuttmirixiki Karaha kwieyaritsie.
Tsahuri ti'aitametikaku, xuwenitsixi 'akarenutsixi memiwatakwiniki yamekateniuxata, hiki 'ana mekaniwaraiwa, 'ana mana mekanikuyaxe Karaha kwieyaritsie tau manatineika hepatsie.
'Iki mekanihikitini Kahari nuiwarimama xuwenitsixi wa'aurie mekanitiyaxe Watsani kwieyaritsie meta Tsarikaha kwieyaritsie:
Kuheri Watsani kiekariyaritsie wa'ukiyari kanayani, hutarieka mieme Tsapani kanayani, manata Kanahi meta Tsapati.
Wa'iwamarixi, wa'ukiyarima waniwema, yunaiti me'atahutati mekanakine: Mikaheri, Metsurani, Tsawa, Kurahi, Kakani, Tsiha meta 'Ewexi.

'Iki mekanihikitini 'Awikahiri niwemama, mikita Kuri punu'ayatikai, mikita Karuha punu'ayatikai, mikita Karaha punu'ayatikai, mikita Mikaheri punu'ayatikai, mikita Ketsitsahi punu'ayatikai, mikita Yaru punu'ayatikai, mikita Wutsi punu'ayatikai.
Miki 'iwamarixi muwani'a 'Ahi pihiktikai, 'Awirieri nu'aya meta Kuni teukarieya.
Miki Karaha mekanikuyaxe, Watsani kiekariyaritsie meta kiekari 'etsimiyeyeu 'auriena mamanetikatsie, meta naime Tsaruni kwieyaritetsie mu'ixayatsie, kemiyeukai naime.
Kememite'ununuiwaxi miki megaka'utsie kepauka Kutani miti'aitametikai Kura kwieyaritsie, meta Keruwuhani 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie ti'aitame.

Xuweni, Kahari wanuiwarima meta Manatsexi nuiwarimama hixiapa memi'axe wakuyaxima mekaniyupaimekaitini huta tewiyari heimana nauka miriyari heimana 'atahuta tsienituyari heimana haika tewiyari (44.760) teiteri memiyiwawę, tepia yuhetsie nunuwame memu'i meta 'ixipara, meyiwaweti tupliki, kwinie meteheuyutakwiwaweti.
Mekaniwarutakwini 'akarenutsixi meta Ketuxi, Napitsi metatisiere Nurawi.
Kakaiyari hetsie memitewiyakalki, mekanitawawirieni niivaparewieniki meyukwitiweti, hiki Kakaiyari kaniwaruparewieni memiwara'iwaki 'akarenutsixi meta memiwanikai.

Watewama mekateniyukapinitiani huta teviyari heimana tamamata miriyari (50.000) kameyutsixi, huta tsienituyari heimana huta teviyari heimana tamamata miriyari (250.000) muxatsi, huta miriyari puxuri, meta teiteri mekaniwarutivitya zeitsienituyari miriyari (100.000) meyupaimeme,
miki hipame yumiireme mekaniwarukwini, Kakaiyari wahamatia muyeikakalki. Hiki mana mekanikuyaxe kepaukake memehapanie.

Manatsexi nuiwarimama hixiata memi'axe waniwema yumiireti mepaki meta manatsiere mekanikuyaxe, Watsani mirakutewatsie Wahari-Heximuni paiti me'u'ati, Tsenixi mirakutewatsie meta Heximuni yemuriyaritsie paiti.

Memiwani'akai mekanakine yutiriyama wahetsiemieme 'Epexi, Itsi, 'Eriheri, 'Atsirieri, Keremiyaxi, Hurawiyaxi meta Yariheri. Miki yunaiti kwinimieme memiteheuyutakwiwave mekanihikitikaitini, teiteri memimariva, yuxexuiti yutiriyama mewani'ati mepaki.
Peru 'axamekateniuyurieni yu'ukiyarima wakakaiyari hixie, hipame kakaiyarixi mewarayexeiyati memakiki, Kakaiyari teiteri miwaruka'unakai wakakaiyarixi.

'Ayumieme 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya Puri pupitta, tatsiari, Tikirati-Piretsexi, 'Atsiriyatsie ti'aitame, miki kaniwarehapani Xuweni nuiwarimama, Kahari nuiwarimama meta Manatsexi nuiwarimama hixiata memi'axe, kaniwarehapani Karaki paiti meta Kawuxi, Hara, meta Kutsani hatuxameyari 'aurie, hiki 'akuxi mana mekanekuteni.
'Iki mekanihikitini Rewi nivemanama: Keritsuni, Kuhati meta Merari.
Kuhati nivemama: 'Amirani, 'Itsaxi, Hewuruni meta 'Utsiheri.
'Amirani nivemama: 'Aruni, Muitsexi meta Miriyami. 'Aruni nivemama: Narawi, 'Awihu, 'Eriyatsaxi meta 'Itamaxi.
'Eriyatsaxi Pinexi paapaya kanayani. Pinexi 'Awitsuha paapaya kanayani,
'Awitsuha Wukihi paapaya kanayani, Wukihi 'Utsihi paapaya kanayani,
'Utsihi Tserahiyaxi paapaya kanayani, Tserahiyaxi Merayuti paapaya kanayani,
Merayuti 'Amariyaxi paapaya kanayani, 'Amariyaxi 'Akituwi paapaya kanayani,
'Akituwi Tsaruki paapaya kanayani, Tsaruki 'Akimatsi paapaya kanayani,
'Akimatsi 'Atsariyaxi paapaya kanayani, 'Atsariyaxi Kuhanahani paapaya kanayani,
Kuhanahani 'Atsariyaxi paapaya kanayani. Miki 'Atsariyaxi mawari wewiwame patia Tsarumuni tuki mutawewita Kerutsaremee.
'Atsariyaxi 'Amariyaxi paapaya kanayani, 'Amariyaxi 'Akituwi paapaya kanayani,
'Akituwi Tsaruki paapaya kanayani, Tsaruki Tsaruni paapaya kanayani,
Tsaruni Kirikiyaxi paapaya kanayani, Kirikiyaxi 'Atsariyaxi paapaya kanayani,
'Atsariyaxi Tserahiyaxi paapaya kanayani, Tserahiyaxi Kutsarakipaapaya kanayani.
Kutsarakikanehanieni kepauka Yawé Nawukurunutsuximupitia Kura meta Kerutsaremekiekatarimuwaranuhapaniki.
Rewiniwemama mekanakine Keritsuni, Kuhati meta Merari.
Keritsuni niwemama: Rivvini meta Tsimi.
Kuhati niwemama: 'Amirani, 'Itsaxi, Hewuruni meta 'Utsiheri.
Merari niwemama: Makiri meta Mutsihi. 'Iki mekanakine revitisixi wanuiwarima yuxexuitiyutiriyama kemenitewarayexei.
Keritsuni nuiwarimama mekanakine: Rivvini, Yakati, Tsimaha,
Kuha, 'Iru, Tserameta Yatirahi.
Kuhati nuiwarimama mekanakine: 'Aminarawi, Kure, 'Atsixi,
'Erikana, 'Ewhatsahapi, 'Atsixi,
Takati, 'Uriheri, 'Utsiyaxi meta Tsahuri.
'Erikana niwemama mekanakine: 'Amatsahi meta 'Akimuti.
'Akimuti nuiwarimama mekanakine: 'Erikana, Tsupahi, Nakati,
'Eriyawi, Keruhanimeta 'Erikana.
Tsamuheri niwemama mekanakine: Watsini matiari mieme, meta 'Awiyaxi.
Merari nuiwarimama mekanakine: Makiri, Rivvini, Tsimi, 'Utsa,
Tsimaha, Kakiyaxi meta 'Atsahiyaxi.
'Iki mekanihikitini kwikamete Rawiri muwaranayexei Yawé tukieyata memimiemetetiniki, kepaukapaiti tiratu kakuniyari muwa meutatekle.

Miki neputilkwikakairi 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwekaitsie, hixiena met'iuweti, Tsarumuni 'akuxi tuki katawewiwekaku Yawé hetsiemieme Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie. Hiki tawari mekanitsutiani yu'uximayatsika kememite'uhiritiariekai.
'Iki meta niwemama kwikari mepihiritiariekai: Kuhati nuiwarimama, kwikame Hemani Kuheri kaninu'ayatikaitini, Tsamuheri nuiwarieyatsie mieme,
'Erikana, Keruhani, 'Eriheri, Tuba,
Tsupi, 'Erikana, Mahati, 'Amatsahi,
'Erikana, Kuheri, 'Atsariyaxi, Tsupuniyaxi,
Takati, 'Atsixi, 'Ewihatsahapi, Kure,
'Itsaxi, Kuhati, Rewi meta 'Ixaheri.
Hemani tserieta 'iwaya kaniutiikekakaitini 'Atsahapi Werekiyaxi nu'aya, Tsimaha nuiwarieya hetsiemieme,
Mikaheri, Watsehiyaxi, Marikiyaxi,
'Etini, Tsera, 'Arahiyaxi,
'Etani, Tsimaha, Tsimi,
Yakati, Keritsuni meta Rewi.
Hemani 'utatana 'Etani kaniutiikekakaitini Kitsihi nu'aya, wa'iwa kanihikitikaitini meraritsixi wahetsiemieme, 'Awuri, Maruki,
Katsawiyaxi, 'Amatsiyaxi, Kirikiyaxi,
'Amitsí, Wanihi, Tsemexi,
Makiri, Mutsihi, Merari meta Rewi.
Wa'iwama revitisixi mekateni'uximayakaitini Kakaiyari tukieyata.

'Aruni meta niwemama mepihiritiariekai mawari memuttiaiyaniki mawari taiyametsie, meta 'ikwa taiyametsie. Kemitlu'aitaxi Muitsexi, Kakaiyari ti'uximayatsiriwame meta mekanihiritiariekaitini Waikawa Muyepatsietsie hepaitsita muwa 'ixaheritsixi wahetsiemieme 'tiiya mawariyari memiwewiekaki.
'Aruni nuiwarinama mekanakine: 'Eriyatsaxi, Pinexi, 'Awitsuha,
Wukihi, 'Utsihi, Tserahiyaxi,
Merayuti, 'Amariyaxi, 'Akituwi,
Tsaruki meta 'Akimatsi.
Kememite'ukutetikatei 'Aruni nuiwarinama. Kuhati nuiwarinama meri kwie mekaniyetuiriyarieni 'iniariki,
Hewuruni Kura kwieyaritsie, kwie hautinikame hakewa memitehetihiweni.
Karewi Kepune nu'aya, kiekari kwieyari katiniunake meta 'auriena mamanetika kiekari 'etsimiyeyeu.
'Aruni nuiwarinama mekaniyetuiriyarieni kiekarite 'ixaheritsixi wahetsie nunuwame, pihikitikai: Hewuruni, Riwina, Katixi, 'Etsitemuha,
Hireni, Rewixi,
'Atsani meta Weti-Tsemetsi, kwie heutinitikaine memitehatihiwenitsie.

Wenikamini nuiwarinama wakwietsieta mekaniyetuiriyarieni: Kehewa, 'Aremeti meta 'Anatuti, kwie heutinitikaime hakewa memitehetihiweni. Naiti tamamata heimana haika kiekariyari mekaniyetuiriyarieni, yutiiriyama kememitewarexeiyakai.
Kuhati nuiwariinama memuyuhayewaxi mepiyetuiriyarie 'iniariki tamamata kiekariyari Manatsexi nuiwariinama hixiata memi'axe wakwieyaritsie.

Keritsuni nuiwariinama, kememiyupaimekai watiiriyama, mekaniyetuiriyarieni tamamata heimana haika kiekariyari 'Itsakaxi, 'Atsexi meta Nepitalari wanuiwarima wakwieyaritetsie, metatsiere Manatsexi nuiwariinama Watsani memuyuhayewaxi wakwieyaritsie.
Merari nuiwariinama, watiiriyama kememiyupaimekai, mekaniyetuiriyarieni 'iniariki tamamata heimana huta kiekariyari Xuweni, Kahari meta Tsawuruni wakwieyaritetsie miemete.
'Izaheritsixi mipai rewitsixi mekateniwayetuirieni kwie hakewa memitehetihiweni heutinitikaime.
Mekaniwayetuirieni 'iniariki Kura nuiwariinama wakiekarite Tsimehuni meta Wenikamini, meripaitiri memuttieriwariekai.
Hipaitia Kuhati nuiwariinama 'iniariki mekaniyetuiriyarieni kiekarite 'Epirahini kwieyaritsie miemete.
Kiekari teiteri wahetsie nunuwame mekaniyetuiriyarieni Tsikeni 'Epirahini yemuriyaritetsie, Ketsehexi,
Kumehani, Weti-Kuruni,
'Ayaruni meta Kahati-Ximuni, kwie hakewa memitehetihiweni heutinitikaime.
Hipatita Kuhati nuiwariinama mekaniyetuiriyarieni 'Anexi meta Wirehani kiekariteyari Manatsexi nuiwariinama hixiata memi'axe wakwieyartisie mieme, kvie hakewa memitehetihiweni heutinitikaine.

Keritsuni nuiwariinama mekaniyetuiriyarieni Manatsexi nuiwariinama hixiata memi'axe wakwieyartisie mieme: Kurani Watsani kwieyartisie mieme, meta 'Atsitaruti, kvie hakewa memitehetihiweni heutinitikaine.
'Itsakaxi nuiwariinama wakwieyartisie mekaniyetuiriyarieni: Tseretsi, Taverati,
Xamuti meta 'Aneni, kvie hakewa memitehetihiweni heutinitikaine.
'Atsexi nuiwariinama wakwieyartisie mekaniyetuiriyarieni Matsari, 'Awuruni,
Hukuki meta Xekuwi, kvie hakewa memitehetihiweni heutinitikaine.
Nepitahari nuiwariinama wakwieyartisie mekaniyetuiriyarieni Tseretsi Karereya kwieyartisie mieme, Hamuni meta Kiriyatahini, kvie hakewa memitehetihiweni heutinitikaine.
Hipatita Merari nuiwariinama mekaniyetuiriyarieni kiekarite Tsawuruni nuiwariinama wakwieyartisie miemete: Ximuni meta Tawuxi, kvie hakewa memitehetihiweni heutinitikaine.
Xuweni nuiwariinama wakwieyartisie miemete, Kurutani hatetsitayartisie tau manatineika hepatisie mukuma, Keriku 'anutaize mekaniyetuiriyarieni, Wetsexi makumawetsie miti'ane, Katsa,
Karenutti meta Mepati, kvie hakewa memitehetihiweni heutinitikaine.
Kahari nuiwariinama wakwieyaritsie mekaniyetuiriyarieni Xamuti Karaha kwieyaritsie, Makanahini,
Hetsivuni meta Katsexi, kvie hakewa memitehetihiweni heutinitikaine.
'Itsakaxi niwemama meyunaukati mepaki: Tura, Puwa, Yatsuwi meta Tsimiruni.

Tura niwemama mekanakine: 'Utsihi, Xepahiyaxi, Kerileri, Yamahi, 'Iwitsani meta Tsamuheri, miki meyunaiti kwinimieme mekateneuyutakwiwawekaitini, meta yuliwama Tura nuiwarimama mewani'ati mekanakine. Kemaine wanuiwari xapayari, Rawiri 'amuyelkakaitisie xeitewiyari heimana huta miriyari heimana 'ataxewime tsienituyari (22.600) mekaniyupaimekaitini.
'Itsirahiyaxi 'Utsihi kaninu'ayatikaitini, 'Itsirahiyaxi niwemama mekanakine: Mikaheri, 'Awiriyaxi, Kuheri meta 'Itsiyaxi, meyunaiti miki meyu'auxiwiti meniwani'a mepihikitikai.
Mepiyumiirekai wa'ittama meta waniwema, kemaine wanuiwari xapayari, menjwarexeiyakai xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana 'ataxewime miriyari (36.000) teiteri kuyaxa miemete.
Yunaiti 'iwamarixi mepihikitikai 'Itsakaxi niwemama nauka tewiyari heimana 'atahuta miriyari (87.000) mepihikitikai kuyaxi memeuyutakwiwawe.
Wenikamini niwemama mekanakine: Wera, Wekexi meta Keriyaheri, mekaniyuhalkani yunaiti.

Wera niwemama mekanakine: 'Etsivumi, 'Utsihi, 'Utsiheri, Kerimuti meta Tri, meyu'auxiwiti mepaki. Miki yunaiti memanuyetei memiwani'a memilikiikai meta memeuyutakwiwawe, xeitewiyari heimana huta miriyari heimana xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana nauka (22.034) mepiyupaimekai kuyaki meuyutakwiwawe.
Wekexi niwemama mekanakine Tsemira, Kuhatsi, 'Eriyetsexi, 'Erihuhenahi, 'Umiri, Kerimuti, 'Awiyaxi, 'Anatuti meta 'Arameti. Miki yunaiti Wekexi menjniwemamatikai,
memanuyetei memiwani'a memilikiikai yu'iwama wahetsie meta kuyaxi memeuyutakwiwawe memilikiikai. Kemaine wanuiwari xapayari, xeitewiyari heimana huta tsienituyari (20.200) mekaniyupaimekaitini.
Wirihani Keriyaheri punu'ayatikai. Wirahani niwemama mekanakine: Kehutsi, Wenikamini, 'Ahuri, Kenana, Tsetani, Taritsi meta 'Akitsakaxi.

Miki yunaiti Keriyaheri nepunuiwari-mama, meta memanuyetei memiwani'a memilikiikai meta memeuyutakwiwawe. Mekaniyupaimekaitini yunaiti, tamamata heimana 'atahuta miriyari heimana huta tsienituyari (17.200) teiteri kuyaxa miemete.
'Ixi niwemama mekanihikitini: Tsupini meta Kupini. Kutsini 'Akexi nu'aya patia.
Nepitahari niwemama mekanakine: Yatseri, Kuni, Ketsexi meta Tsaruni. Miki mekanihikitini Wiriha nuiwarimama.
Manatsexi niwemama yuparewiwanne 'iyayattii mihikitikai Tsiriya kiekame hetsie muwarayexei mekanakine: 'Atsirieri meta Makixi, 'Iki 'imatirieka mieme Karaha paapaya patia.
Makixi Mahaka kaniutivitini, Kupini meta Tsupini wa'iwa. Hutarieka mieme waniwe katinitewakatitini Tserupekari, miki 'ukarawetsixi xelkia kaniwarutinuarieni.
Makixi 'iyaya Mahaka xeime nunutsi kanayexeiya, miki Peretsi katiniteriwa. Miki Tseretsi 'iwaya kanayani 'Urani meta Xekeni wapaapa.
Werahani 'Urani nu'aya kanayani. Miki mekanakine Karaha niwemama, Makixi nu'aya, mikita Manatsexi nu'aya.
'Iwaya 'uka Hamureketi 'Itsuri mamaaya kanayani, meta 'Awibetsexi Makira matia.
Tsemira niwemama mekanakine: 'Ahiyani, Tsikeni, Rikeki meta 'Anihani.
'Epirahini nuiwarimama: Tsutera, Wereri, Takati, 'Erara, Takati,
Tsawari, Tsutera, 'Etsexi meta 'Erari. Kahati kiekatari 'iki yuhutame mekaniwarukwini watewama mewaruhawatsirieku.
Miixa tukari 'Epirahini yuniwema wahetsiemieme kaniyuhivereikaitini, hiki 'iwamama mekaniu'axiani me'initianike.
Hiki tawari yu'iya matia xeime mekanayexeiya nunutsi, miki Weriya katiniteriwa hivverika muxuawekalki wakie.
Weriha nu'aya 'uka Tsera kiekari Weti-Kuruni meuttiewatsie mukuma kaniutawewieni meta Weti-Kuruni mukuwertisie mukuma, metatsiere 'Utseni-Tsera.
Weriha nuiwarimama mekanakine: Xepa, Xetsepi, Teraha, Takani,
Rarani, 'Amihuri, 'Eritsama,
Nuni meta Kutsuhexi.

Hakewa miwarekwietikai hakewa memetitekai kanayani Weteri meta kiekari 'etsimiyeyeu 'auriena mananetika, Narani tau manatineika hepatsie, Ketschexi meta kiekari 'etsimiyeyeu 'auriena mananetika tau makayuyujpike hepatsie, meta Tsikeni kiekari 'etsimiyeyeu 'auriena mananetika naime, metatsiere 'Ayaha kiekariyari 'etsimiyeyeu 'auriena mananetika naime.

Manatsexi nuiwarimama Wetsehani katiniwapinitikaitini meta Tanaki, Mekiru metatsiere Ruxi, yu'aurie kiekari 'etsimimiyeyeu mexeiyatika naime. Miki kiekariyaritetsie mekanikuyaxe Kutse 'Ixaheri nu'aya nuiwarimama.
'Atsexi niwemama mekanakine: 'Imina, 'Itsiwa, 'Itsiwi, Weriya meta wa'iwa 'uka Tsera.
Weriya nivemama mekanakine: Hewexi meta Mariktheri, miki Wiritsawiti paapaya matia.
Hewexi nivemama mekanakine: Kapireti, Tsemexi, Kutani meta wa'iva 'uka Tsuha.
Kapireti nivemama mekanakine: Patsaki, Wimari meta 'Atsiwati.
'Iwaya Tsemexi nivemama mekanakine: Xuheka, Kehuwa meta 'Arami.
'Iwaya Heremi nivemama mekanakine: Tsupaha, 'Imina, Tseretsi meta 'Amari.
Tsupaha nivemama mekanakine: Tsuhaki, Haxinepexi, Tsuhari, Werihi, 'Imira,
Wetsexi, Huri, Tsama, Tsiritsa, 'Ttirani meta Wehera.
Ketexi nivemama mekanakine: Kepune, Pitsipa meta 'Araha.
'Ura nivemama mekanakine: 'Araki, Kaniberi meta Xitsiya.

'Iki meyunaiti 'Atsexi nuiwarimama mepikiki, memanuyetekai memiwani'akai yu'iwama mepihikitikai, teiteri 'aixia memiteheuyutakwiwave, memitirikawi meta memimamariwave. Kemaine wanuiwari xapayaritsie memaka'uxatsie mekanihikitikaitini xeitewiyari heimana 'ataxewi miriyari (26.000) teiteri kuyaxa miemete.
Wenikamini nivemama mekanakine: mexiakame, Wera, hutarieka mieme, 'Atsiweri,
hairieka mieme, 'Akaraha, Naurieka mieme, Nuka, meta 'auxiwirieka mieme, Xapaha.
Wera niwemama mekanakine: 'Araxi, Keraha, 'Awihuri,
'Awitsuha, Nahamani, 'Akuhaki,
Keraha, Tsepupani meta Hirami.
'Ahuri niwemama, memanuyetekai yu'iwama memiwani'a kai Kehewa mirakutewatsie memititekai, 'arike memeki Manakati paiti, mekaniyiakatini:
Nahamani, 'Ahiyaxi meta Keraha, 'Utsa paapaya meta 'Akhluri. Keraha katinluyurieni Manakati paiti miwarewiti.
Tsakarahini 'arike yu'ittama waruku'eirieku Kutsini meta Waraha, tawari kaniwarayexeiya yuniwema Muhawi kwieyaritsie.
Yu'iya Huretsi matia Kuwawi kanayexeiya meta Tsiwiha, Metsaha, Marikani,
Kehutsi, Tsakiyaxi meta Mixima. 'Iki niwemama menanuyetei memiwani'a yu'iwama mekanakine.
Kutsini matiata kaneyexeiya 'Awituwi meta 'Eripari.
'Eripari niwemama makanakine: 'Ewexi, Mitsani meta Tsemeri. Tsemeri kiekarite 'Unuhu meta Ruri kaniuttwewieni, meta kiekari 'etsimuyeyeu wa'aurie mamanetika,
Weriya meta Tsema memanuyetei memiwani'a mekanakine 'Ayaruni kiekatari wahetsiemieme, meta mekaniwarutaweiya Kahati kiekatari.
Weriya niwemama mekanakine: 'Akihu, Tsatsaki, Keremuti,
Tsewariyaxi, 'Arari, 'Arexi,
Mikaheri, 'Itsipa meta Yuká.
Tsewariyaxi, Metsurani, Hitsiki, 'Ewexi,
'Itsimerahi, Ketsiriyaxi meta Kuwawi, miki mekanakine 'Eripari nivemama.
Yakini, Tsikiri, Tsawiri,
'Erihenahi, Tsiretahi, 'Eriheri,
'Arahiyaxi, Werahiyaxi meta Tsimirati, miki mekanakine Tsimi nivemama.
'Itsipani, 'Ewexi, 'Eriheri,
'Awuruni, Tsikiri, Kanahani,
Kananiyaxi, 'Erami, 'Anatutiyaxi,
'Ipirahiyaxi meta Peniheri, miki mepaki Tsatsaki nivemama.
Tsamitserahi, Tsehariyaxi, 'Atahariyaxi,
Karetsiyaxi, 'Eriyaxi meta Tsikiri, miki mekanakine Keruhani nivemama.
Kemaine wanuiwari xapayari, miki memanuyttei meniwani'a mepaki meta Kerutsareme menjkiekataritikai.
Kehiheri Kawahuni paapaya, Kawahuni kanikiekametikaitini. 'Iyaya pititewakai Mahaka.
Nivemama mepaki 'Awuruni matiari mieme, Tsuxi, Kihitsi, Wahari, Nexi, Narawi,
Keruxi, 'Akihu, Tsekexi
meta Mikuruti, miki Tsimaha paapaya matia. Meta 'Iki Kerutsareme mepititekai yul'iwama wahetsia.
Nexi Kihitsi paapaya kanayani, mikita Tsahuri paapaya kanayani, mikita Kunatani paapaya matia, meta Marikitsuha, 'Awinarawi metatsiere 'Etsiwahari.
Kunatani Meriwahari paapaya kanayani, mikita Mikahiyaxi paapaya kanayani.
Mikahiyaxi nivennama mekanakine Pituhuni, Mereki, Tareya meta 'Akatsi.
'Akatsi Kuhara paapaya kanayani, mikita 'Aremeti paapaya kanayani meta 'Atsimaweti meta Tsimiri. Tsimiri Mutsaha paapaya kanayani,
Mutsaha Winaha paapaya kanayani, mikita Xapaha paapaya kanayani, Xapaha 'Eratsa paa- paya kanayani, mikita 'Atseri paapaya kanayani.
'Atseri 'ataxewime yuniwema puwarayexei, mekatenitetewakatini: 'Atsirikani, Wukuru, 'Itsimaheri, Tsehariyaxi, 'Awiriyaxi meta Kanahani. 'Iki mekanakine 'Atseri niwemama.
'Iwaya 'Etseki nivennama mekanakine: mexiakame, 'Urani, hutarieka mieme, Kehutsi, hairieka mieme, 'Eripereti.

'Urani nivennama meheuyutakwiwaweti mekanakine meta metemiwaweti tupiki. Waikawa yuniwema mekaniwarayexeiya meta yuteukarima: yunaiti xeitsienituyari heimana huta teviyari heimana tamamata (150) mekaniyupaimekatini. Yunaiti miki Wenikamini nuiwarimama mekanihikitikaitini.
Yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi mekanakatutsieni yunuiwari xapayaritsie meta mekanakatutsieni te'aitamete waxapatsie 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie memite'aitakai.
Kakaiyari memikaheu'eniekaiki, Kura kwieyaritsie kiekatari mekanehapanieni Wawiruniya.
Hipati Kura, Wenikamini, 'Epirahini meta Manatsexi wanuiwarima Kerutsareme mekaniu'axiani mana metiyaxeke.
Kura nuiwarimama wahetsiemieme mekaniu'axiani: 'Utahi 'Amihuri nu'aya, 'Umiri nu'aya, 'Imiri nu'aya, Wanihi nu'aya, Paretsi nuiwarieyatsie miemete, Kura nu'aya.
Tsiru kiekatari: 'Atsahiyaxi mexiakame mieme, yuniwema warawititi.
Tsera nuiwarimama hetsiemieme: Kehueri meta 'iwamama, yunaiti mepihikitikai 'ataxewime tsienituyari heimana nauka tewiyari heimana tamamata (690) teiteri.
Wenikamini nuiwarimama hetsiemieme: Tsaru Metsurani nu'aya, Hurawiyaxi nu'aya, Tsenuha nu'aya,
'Iwinehiyaxi Keruhani nu'aya, 'Eraha 'Utsihi nu'aya, mikita Mikuri nu'aya, Metsurani Tsepatiyaxi nu'aya, mikita Xehueri nu'aya, mikita 'Iwiniyaxi nu'aya,
yumarema warawititi. Kemaine wanuiwari xapayari, mekaniyupaimekaitini yunaiti 'atanauka tsienituyari heimana huta tewiyari heimana tamamata heimana 'ataxewi (956), miki
yunait memanuyetei yu'iwama memiwani'a mekanihikitikaitini.
Mawari wewiwamete wanuiwari hetsiemieme: Kerahiyaxi, Kuyarivvi, Kakini,
'Atsariyaxi Kirikiyaxi nu'aya, heitserie Metsurani nuiwarieyatsie mieme, Tsaruki, Merayuti meta 'Akituwi, ti'aitame matia Kakaiyari tukita miemeki,
'Arahiyaxi Keruhani nu'aya, mikita Patsuxi nu'aya, mikita Marikiyaxi nu'aya, Matsahi 'Arieri nu'aya, heitserie Katsera nuiwarieyatsie mieme, Metsurani, Metsiremiti meta 'Imexi,

meta wamarema, yunaiti mekanihikitikaitini xeimiriyari heimana 'atahuta tsienituyari heimana haika tewiyari (1.760), mipai mekaniyupaimekaitini memanuyetei memiwani'akai xeikia, teiteri memite'akumalkai Kakaiyari tukieyata memite'uximayakaki.
Rewitsixi wanuiwariyari hetsiemieme: Tsemahiyaxi Katsuwi nu'aya, heitserie 'Atsirikani nuiwarieyatsie mieme, Katsawiyaxi meta Merari,
Wakiwakaxi, Heretsi, Karari meta Mataniyaxi Mikahiyaxi nu'aya, Tsikiri nu'aya, mikita 'Atsahapi punu'aya,
'Awiriyaxi Tsemahiyaxi nu'aya, mikita Karari punu'aya, mikita Kerutuni punu'aya, Werekiyaxi 'Atsá nu'aya, mikita 'Erikana nu'aya, netupatari wakwietsie mukatei.
Kitenie memu'uwekai: Tsaruni, 'Akuwi, Tarimuni meta 'Akimani meta yumarema warawititi, Tsaruni wa'ukiyari pihikitikai.
Hiki 'akuxi mepi'iviya ti'aitame kitenieya, tau manatineika hepa muwietsie, meta rewitsixi mematitei wakitenie nepu'uwe.
Meripaiti, Pinexi 'Eriyatsaxi nu'aya puwa'ukiyaritikai, Yawé hamatiana kani-uyeikakaitini.
Tsakariyaxi Metseremiyaxi nu'aya, miki kitenie hiweme pihikitikai 'ixuriki tukiyari kitenieyaritsie.

Kemi'ane memanayexeiyarie kitenie memu'uweniki yunaiti mekanihikitikaitini huta tsieniuyari heimana tamamata heimana huta. Wakiekaritsie kanitikateni wanuiwari xapayarite kememite'aka'utsie. Rawiri meta Tsamuheri tewi mitikeiya, yamekateniwaruhiritiani kememiteyuriekakekai.
Kitenie hiwemete meta waniwema mekanihiritiariekaitini memi'iviyaniki 'ixuriki tukiyari kitenieyari, miki Yawé tukieya mihikitiniki 'amuwekai.
Kitenie hiwemete mekani'ukaitini naukakia, tatserieta, ta'utata, tayeta meta tahetia.
'Atahuta tukaritsie, 'iwamarixi meniyu-parewiekaitini 'axelkia memititetikatei.
Yunaukati kitenie hiwemete mexiaicate yamekateni'uximayakaitini. Rewitisixi mekanihikitikaitini, kiita paiti meteni'iviyametetikaitini, meta miraye'atika
Kakaiyari tukita timieme mekanihiritiariekaitini.
Tikariki tehivvenete mekananieretikkakaitini tuki warita, ximerita tukita naltsarie mekatene uyepiwakaitini.
Hipatita mepihiritiariekai tita mawari matiwewiva mitiyukumaiwa tuki manuwe hetsiemieme, mepiteti'ininiatakai memitehewayepinekaitsie meta memite'uti'utakatisie.
Hipatita mepihiritiariekai piinite Kakaiyaritisie timieme mitipatsie tukita paiti mitiyukumaiwakai, watsute, harina, winu, hatseiti, ikwa meta witsimitii'iatika.
Hipati mawari wewiwamete mepikawewiwakai witsimu'ia.
Rewi tewiyari Matatiyaxi Tsaruni maitarieya Kure nuiwarieya hetsiemieme, miki pihiritiariekai tiriku tsuirayari mitiwewiwaniki mawariyari.
Hipatita maremama kuhattisixi mepikawewiwakai paa Kakaiyari hetsiemieme mipatsietika xawatiki mieme.

Metatsiere kwikamete mepuxuawekai rewitsixi wanuiwarima mepihikitikai, yuniwema memitewa'aitia mepihikitikai. Miki tuki manuwe mepititekai kaneixeiyakaitini waika kii. Miki mepikayiwawekai tawari yiki memiteyurieka, miki tukariki tikariki yamemite'uximayakaiki kememitehiritiariekai.
Kemaine wanuiwari xapayari, miki memanuyttei mepihikitikai memiwani'a rewitsixi meta Kerutsaremme mepititekai.
Kawahuni kiekariyaritsie Kehieri kaniukateitini, Kawahuni paapaya. 'Iyaya Mahaka katinitewakatitni,
nivemanna mekanakine: matiari nieme 'Awuruni, Tsuxi, Kihitsi, Wahari, Nexi, Narawi,
Keruxi, 'Akihu, Tsakariyaxi meta Mikuruti, Tsimani paapaya matia. Mikitsiere Kerutsareme mepititekai yumarema wahamatia.
Nexi Kihitsi paapaya kanayani, Kihitsi Tsahuri paapaya kanayani, Tsahuri Kunatani paapaya kanayani meta Marikitsuha, 'Awinarawi meta 'Etsiwahari.
Kunatani Meriwahari paapaya kanayani, Meriwahari Mikahiyaxi paapaya kanayani.
Mikahiyaxi nivemanna mekanakine Pituhuni, Mereki, Tareya meta 'Akatsi.
'Akatsi Kara paapaya kanayani, mikita 'Aremeti paapaya kanayani meta 'Atsimaweti meta Tsimiri. Tsimiri Mutsaha paapaya kanayani,
Mutsaha Winaha paapaya kanayani, mikita Xepahiyaxi paapaya kanayani, Xepahiyaxi 'Eratsa paapaya kanayani, mikita 'Atseri paapaya kanayani.
'Atseri meyu'ataxewime kaniwarayexeiya, mekateniteewakatitni: 'Atsirikani, Wukuru, 'Itsimaheri, Tsehariyaxi, 'Awiriyaxi meta Kanahani. Miki 'Atseri nivemanna mekanakine.
Merikitsi piritsiteutsixi mekanivyutakwini 'ixaheritsixi wahamatia, hiki 'ana 'ixaheritsixi mekaneuyuta'unaxiani, yumireti mekaniukwi'iwa Kiriwuha hiriyaritisie.
Hiki piritsiteutsixi Tsahuri mekananukuweiya, hiki nivemama mekanivarukwini Kunatani, 'Awinarawi meta Marikitsuha.
Hiki Tsahuri pikawakemakairi, 'ana tupiki temimimete piritsiteutsixi mekanitamini mekani'axe. Hiki 'u'axieka,
Tsahuri mipai katiniutahiawe mikuhinekai: «'A'ixipara keniwatihanaka keneneumi'a, para memikanetsikumeniwaniki xitekiya 'iniariyari memikahexeiya, me'axiame menetsi'uti'atsekimenetsinanaimati».
‘Ana 'iparewiwame waikawa kanimakaitini pika'uyuwairi mimieniki, hiki Tsahuri yukimana yu'ixiparatsie kaniyukaxuni.
Kepauka 'ihiweme Tsahuri muzei mukiime, yaxelkiata miki yu'ixiparaki kaniuyumieni.
Mipai mekateniukwini Tsahuri meta nivemama memiyuhaika. Miki tukaritisie yunaiti mekaniukwini miki nivemama.

Kepauka 'ixaheritsixi mayeweritisie kiekatari memunenierixi kuyaxi 'ixaheritsixi kemennite'uyuta'unaxiakai, meta Tsahuri yaxelkia nivemama kemennite'ukwi'iwakai, mikita yukiekarite mekaniuku'eiriexiani mekaniyuta'unaxiani. Mipai mete'iku'eirieku piritsiteutsixi mana mekanitamare.
Hiki 'uxa'arieka kepauka piritsiteutsixi memu'axia memiwarukwikai wapiiinite mete'anupinike, mana mikime mekaniutaxeiya Tsahuri meta nivemama Kiriwuha hiriyaritsie.

Hiki 'ana mekatenepini pimiteya, mu'uya mekanetuni meta 'ixiparaya, 'ana naitsarie piritsiteutsixi wahetsia mekaneitani'axiani niuki yukakaiyarixi wahetsia memitaxataxianiki meta yuteiterima wahetsia.
Yukakaiyarixi watukita mekaniyewitiaxiani pimiteya kuyaxa timieme, meta mu'uya Rakuni tukita mekaniyewieni.
Kepauka Kawetsi Karaha kwieyaritsie kiekatari memite'utamari piritsiteutsixi Tsahuri kemenuyuriekai.

'Ana mekaniyukuha'aritiani yunaiti memika'ukamama mana Tsahuri kaxarieya mekaniwarunawairieni meta nivemama. Mekaniware'ini Kawetsi paiti, wa'umete mekanekateuku xiu Kawetsi muve hetia, miya mete'uyurieka mekaniuyuhakieni 'atahuta tukari.

Hiki Tsahuri kaniumini Yawé mika'anu'eniki, niukieya ka'anu'enieka, 'uka mitimaiwe hetsia kaniuta'iwauni, Yawé kaha'iwawiyati, 'ayumieme tukarieya kaninawairieni meta mira'aitakaitsie, Rawiri pita kaniyetuirieni 'Itsahi nu'aya.
Merikitsi 'ixaheritsixi teiteriya yunaiti Hewuruni mekaniuyukuxeirieni Rawiri hetsia,
mana mipai mekatenitaliawe: «Tame meta 'eki tepi'ivamarixi.

Meripaitiri 'eki, kepauka Tsahuri mitl'aitametikaitsie, 'eki pepiwani'akai 'ixaheritsixi memiyukwitiwekaitsie. Metatsiere Yawé Kakaiyari mipai pimatiutahiawixi: "Eki neteiterima 'ixaheritsixi pekaniwayewitimiki meta pekatiniwata'aitiamiki"».

Merikite, yunaiti 'ukirawetsixi 'Ixaheritsie kiekatari mekanekine Hewuruni paiti Rawiri hetsia, hiki miki mana tiratu wahamatia kaniuwewieni Yawé hixie. Hiki 'ana Rawiri hatseiti mekanikawirieni, 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie ti'aitame mayaniki, Yawé kemainekai Tsamuheri kemirahiawekai.
Merikitsi Rawiri meta yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi teiteriyari mekanekine Kewutsi mirakutewatsie (tatsiari Kerutsareme), mana kewutseutsixi mekanititekaitini.
Hiki Kewutsi kiekatari Rawiri mipai mekateniutahiawe: «Pepikayiwe 'uwa pematahani». Peru Rawiri Kiekariena Tsiyuni yukuraru 'amatitewa mexeiyakai kanai'wa, metatsiere mumatiwa Rawiri kiekariena.

Rawiri mipai piitwarutahiawekai yukuyaxima: «Kemi'ane meri kewutseu tewiyari munieni xeime miki kuyaxi wa'ukiyari kanayeimiki». 'Ana Kuhawi Tsariwiya nu'aya xeime kewutseu tewiyari kaniumieni, miki kuyaxi wa'ukiyari kanayeitiarieni.
Rawiri yukie kanayelitiani miki kiekari yukuraru 'amatitewa mexeiya, hiki 'ayumieme mipai katinitewaka «Rawiri Kiekarieya».
Meta kiekari kaniutawewieni kwie meukawiwiyatsie 'itsutiaka meta kiekari warita, meta Kuhawi Kerutsareme kiekariyari 'aixia kaniyurienekaitini.
Rawiri matsi waikawa tirikaiyeti kanayeiximekaitini, Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye hamatiana muyeikak aiki.

'Iki mepihikitikai Rawiri kuyaximama wa'ukiyarima, miki mepiparewiekai kepauka mitl'aitametikaitsie, 'ana yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi me'uyukuxeirieka ti'aitame mekaneyettiani 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie miemeki, meripaiti Yawé kemainekai 'Ixaheri hepaitsita.

'Iki Rawiri kuyaximama mekanihikitini memaka'utiarie yemeki memikamamakai: Yatsuwehani Kakumuni nu'aya, miki matsi pihikitikai mexiakanne memuyuhaika memikamamakai, heiva meyukwitiweti haika tsienituyari puwarukwi teiteri yupitsikaki.
Hutarieka miemeta pihikitikai 'Eriyatsaxi Ruruhu nu'aya, 'Akuki nuiwarieya, mikitatsiere yemeki pikamakai peuyutamiewekai.
Rawiri hamatia Patsiramini kaniuyeikakaitini, hakewa piritsitetusixi memeyukuxeiriekai mewatakwinike. Manata tsewara pi'etsiekai, kepauka kuyaxi 'ixaheritsixi memuyuta'unaxi,
'Eriyatsaxi meta Rawiri tsewara mayema mekaniyuhayewa waheima mekaniutanuani piritsiteutsixi mekaniwarukwini. 'Ana Yawé kaniwaruptitani memitehayu'iwaki.

Xeitewiyari heimana tamamata kuyaxi tewa'aitiwamete, miki meyuhalkati, mekanekine mu'aiyatsiepaiti, Rawiri muwayekateitsie paiti 'Arurani teriyarita paiti, piritsiteutsixi mayeweritsie Xepahini mekanikutekaitini.
'Ana Rawiri kaniyu'avietakaitini, 'anata Wereni kiekariyaritsie piritsiteutsixi mekanihikaitini.
Hiki Rawiri miyehariminekaiki mipai kaniutayini: «Neminiyiweniketi haa nemitihareniki Wereni kitenieyaritsie mitiniere».

Hiki memuyuhalka memikamama piritsiteutsixi memakuteitsie me'uyekineka, Wereni haputsuyarita haa mekaniwatihana, hiki Rawiri mekanehanirieni. Peru Rawiri pika'enuhari, kanitayeurieni pita Yawé hetsiemieme,

mipai kaniutayini: «Kakaiyari hixie 'iki haa nepika'anuhareni. Xika ne'enuhareni, memi'atia waxuriya nemanuhareni hepai nepiyini. Yu-tukari mepiyetua kemi'ane haa memi'atia». Hiki 'ayumieme pika'enuhari. 'Iki meyuhalkati mipai mepiteyuriekai waikawa.
'Awitsahi Kuhawi 'iwaya, miki memiyuhalka katiniwa'aitiwametikaitini, miki 'aixia katinikux-axatsiwakatitini. Miki heiwa yupitsika hakweti kaniyutamieni, haika tsienituyari teiteri kani-warukwini.
Miki matsi waikawameki kaniyiwekaitini kuyaki keyuri memiyuhaika, 'ana miki muwani'a kanayani, peru miki wahamatia pika'u'iniatsie.
Wenahiyaxi Kuyara nu'aya kuya phikitikai Kawitseri kiekame. Miki teiteri yuhutame memeuyutakwiwawepiwarukwi Muhawi kiekatari, meta heiva 'u'iwiyakaku putsu muyewakita heukahaka xeime maye kaniumieni.
Meta xeime 'ekipitutanaka huta meturuyari heimana 'imeriyu 'utewime kaniumieni, pitsika kanakwekaitini kwiniepame. Wenahiyaxi matsi kiye xeikia pakwekai, pitsikaya kaninawairieni mikiki kanimieni.
Wenahiyaxi Kuyara nu'aya mipai pitiyurienekai waikawa, mikita 'aixia tikuxaxatsiwati patia memiyuhaika hepai,
peru miki wahamatia pika'u'iniatsie, tsepa xeitewiyari heimana tamamata memuyupaime memikamama muwara'iwakai. Hiki 'ana Rawiri yuhiwemete muwani'a kaneyeitiani.
'Iki kuyaxi memiyiwawekai memikamamakai mekanihikitini: 'Atsaheri, Kuhawi 'iwaya, 'Erikanani Ruruhu nu'aya Wereni kiekame,
Tsamuti Haruri kiekame, Heretsi Peruni kiekame,
'Ira 'Iketsi nu'aya Tekuha kiekame,'Awihet-sexi 'Anatuti kiekame,
Tsiwekahi Kutsa kiekame, 'Irahi 'Akuki nui-warieya hetsiemieme,
Marahi netupatanaka, Kereri Wanaha nu'aya Netupaha kiekame,
'Itahi Xiwahi nu'aya, Kiweha kiekame Wenikamini kvıeyaritsie mitl'ane, Wenahiyaxi Piratuni kiekame,
Kurahi Kahatsi 'akiyaritsie kiekame,'Awirleri Weti-Arawa kiekame,
'Atsimaweti Wakurini kiekame,'Erihawa Tsariwini kiekame,
Katseni Kitsuni kiekame nivemama, Kunatani Tsakehe nu'aya 'Arari kiekame,
'Ahiyani Tsakaxi nu'aya 'Arari kiekame,'Eripari 'Uxi nu'aya,
Hepexi Mekera kiekame,'Ahiyaxi Peruni kiekame,
Ketsiru Kaximeri kiekame, Narahi 'Etsiwahi nu'aya,
Kuheri Natani 'iwaya, Miwaxi Hakiri nu'aya,
Tsereki 'amuni tewiyari, Nakarahi Weruti kiekame Kuhawi hiwemetikai Tsariwiya nu'aya,
Tra 'tiritta tewiyari, Karewi 'tirita tewiyari,
'Uriyaxi Heti tewiyari, Tsawari 'Akirahi nu'aya,
'Arinaha Tsitsaha nu'aya Xuweni nuiwarieya, xuwenitsixi muwani'a pihikitikai meta xeltewiyari heimana tamamata teiteri mekaneweiyakaitini.
Kanahani Mahaka nu'aya, Kutsapati Mitini kiekame,
'Utsiyaxi 'Atsitaruti kiekame, Tsama meta Kehieri Kutani nivemama 'Aruhexi kiekame,
Keriyaheri Tsimiri nu'aya, meta 'iwaya Yuká Titsi kiekame,
'Eriheri Mahawa kiekame, Kerewahi meta Kutsawiyaxi 'Erinahani nivemama, 'Itimaha Muhawi tewiyari, 'Eriheri, 'Uweri meta Katsiheri Tsuwaha kiekame.
'Iki mekanihikitini Rawiri memutinii kuyaxi Tsikiraki 'uyeikakaku, kepauka miki 'ateewa muyeikakai heyeweiyaku Tsahuri Kihitsi nu'aya. Miki mekaniparewieni kepauka miki muyumienekaitsie.
Tupiki temimimete mekanihikitikaitini meta tewipameki mepitetuaxiwawekai meta mepitemiiwawekai yutserieta meta yu'utata.

Wenikamini nuiwarimama Tsahuri maremama: Mitiwa'aitia 'Akihetsexi pihikitikai meta Kuhatsi, Tsema mepiniwemannatikai Kiweya kiekame, Ketsiheri meta Pereti 'Atsimaweti mepiniwemannatikai, Weraka meta Kehu 'Anatuti kiekatari,
'Itsimahiyaxi kawahunitanaka, miki xeitewiyari heimana tamamata kuyaxi puwa'iwatikai meta muwani'a pihikitikai, Keremyaxi, Kahatsieri, Kuhanahani, Kutsawari Kerera kiekame,
'Erutsahi, Kerimuti, Wehariyaxi, Tsemariyaxi, Tsepatiyaxi Harupi nuiwarieya hetsiemieme,
'Erikana, 'Itsiyaxi, 'Atsareri, Kuhetsexi meta Yatsuwehani miki Kure mepinuiwarimamatikai,
Kuhera meta Tsewariyaxi, Keruhani niwe-mama mepihikitikai Keruxi kiekatari.

Hipatita Kahari nuiwarimama Rawiri mekanlutinini kepauka muyu'awietakai makumawetsie. Memeuyutakwiwawe memikamama mepihikitikai, kuyaki mepiha'aritsiekai, mepakumexixiakai pitsikaki meta yuhetsie nunuwameki, mayetsi wahepai mepitehayu'eririyakai, maxatsi yeutari wahepai mepitehanautsawawekai.
Mipai mepitetetewakai: Mexiakame pihikitikai 'Etsexi, 'Awiriyaxi hutarieka mieme, 'Eriyawi hairieka mieme,
Mitsimanaha naurieka mieme, Keremiyaxi 'auxiwirieka mieme,
'Atahi 'atazewirieka mieme, 'Eriheri 'atahutarieka mieme,
Kuhanahani 'atahairieka mieme, 'Eritsawari 'atanaurieka mieme,
Keremiyaxi tamamatarieka mieme meta Makawanahi tamamata heimana xewi mieme.
'Iki Kahari nuiwarimama kuyaxi wa'ukiyarima mepihikitikai, yaki mititirikaive puwakemakai xeitsienituyari, yemeki mitirikaive puwakemakai xeimiriya.

'Iki mekanihikitini Kurutani hatuxame-yaritsie memanuki mexiakame metseriyari 'anuhaku, kepauka haa muwayeneikatsie naime muweritsie meuyunitiva, hiki mana kiekatari mekaniwareutaweiyaxiani 'anutaiyetari meta 'anataiyetari.
Hipatita kuyaxi Wenikamini nuiwarimama hetsiemiemete meta Kura hetsiemiemete Rawiri mekaniutinini mayu'avietakaitsie.

Rawiri kanayeyani waranukunakeke mipai katiniwarutahiawe: «Xika 'aixia 'anemeki xekiyiaka xenetsiparewienike nekanixetanaki'erimiki, peru xika xenetsi'aye'unieti xeyiaka xenetsiyetuanike, ta'ukiyarima wakakaiyari yakeretimani meta ketiwarukwinitiani, netsi tiyumiekame nepikahiki».

'Amatsahi hetsie 'Iyari kaninuani, xeiteviyari heimana tamamata miwani'a, mipai kaniutayini karima: «Rawiri tame 'ahetsia tepumiemete. 'Ahamatia tepu'uwa, 'Itsahi peminu'aya. Haikakia yatepaitika kayuwati tepimatsipitia, 'eki meta kemi'ane mimatsiparewie. Kemi'ane mimatsiparewie Kakaiyari kaniihikitini».
'Ana Rawiri kaniwarutanaki'erieni meta yukuyaxima wa'ukiyarima wahamatia kaniwaranuka'uitiani.

Yaxelkiatatsiere hipati kuyaxi Manatsexi nuiwarimama Rawiri mekaniutinini kepauka 'iki piritsiteutsixi wahamatia mumiekai Tsahuri metamienike. Peru piritsiteutsixi wa'ukiyarima mempunyai mikawaparewieniki. Waikawa mete'utixataka mekanita'imaiya yu'tia miyemieki, mipai me'utiyuaka: «Rawiri tiyu'aitiwame Tsahuri kaniitinimiki, mipai katatinikwimiki».

'Iki mekanihikitini Manatsexi nuiwarimama Rawiri memutini kepauka Tsikiraki metia: 'Arihatsi, Kutsawari, Keriyaheri, Mikaheri, Kutsawari, 'Erihú meta Tsiretahi, manatsexitsixi waiukiyarima mepihikitikai xeimiriyari kuyaxi memiwani'akai.
Rawiri mekaniparewiekaitini kepauka memiwakwitiwekai hipame tenawayamete, miki yuxexuiti memikamama memeuyutakwiwawe mepihikitikai meta kuyaxi memiwani'a mepihikitikai.
Yamepite'axekai kuyaxi Rawiri hetsia me'itininike, mipai yumirreme tiwarexeiyati kanayani Rawiri kuyaxi.
'Ipai mekaniyupaimekaitini kuyaxi waikawa memeuyutakwiwawe Rawiri hetsia memu'axia Hewuruni mirakutewatsie, ti'aitame memeyeitianiki Tsahuri hetsiemieme, Yawé kemutayikai:
Kura nuiwarimama mepiyupaimekai: 'ataxewi miriyari heimana 'atahaika tsienituyari (6.800) kuyaxi 'ari meha'artisteti kuyaxa miemeki.
Tsimehuni nuiwarimama mekaniyupaimekaitini: 'atahuta miriyari heimana zeitsienituyari (7.100) kuyaxi yemeki memeuyutakwiwawe.
Rewi nuiwarimama mekaniyupaimekaitini: nauka miriyari heimana 'ataxewi tsienituyari (4.600),
'Aruni nuiwarimama mekaniyupaimekaitini, haika miriyari heimana 'atahuta tsienituyari (3.700) kuyaxi, Kuyara wa'ukiyari pihikitikai,
meta temaiki Tsaruki, waikawa meuyutamiewe, piwa'ukiyaritikai xeitewiyari heimana huta yu'iwama memanuyetekai.
Wenikamini nuiwarimama, Tsahuri 'iwamama mekaniyupaimekaitini: haika miriyari teiteri, miki Tsahuri mepawelyakai 'aixia mepite'ixelyakai meripaiti.
'Epirahini nuiwarimama mekaniyupaimekaitini: xeitewiyari miriyari heimana 'atahaika tsienituyari (20.800) teiteri memikamama, yu'iwama wasata memimariwakai.
Manatsexi nuiwarimamata hixiata me'ati mekaniyupaimekaitini: tamamata heimana 'atahaika miriyari teiteri memanayexelyarie Rawiri ti'aitame memanukakeniki.

'Itsakaxi nuiwarimama mekaniyupaimekaitini: huta tsienituyari memanuyeteiyu'iwama wabetsie mieme. Miki teiteri mepitemaiwawekai tukari hepaitsita, 'Ixaheri hepaitsita tita 'aixia miti'anekai mepitemaikai.
Tsawuruni nuiwarimama mekaniyupaimekaitini: huta tewiyari heimana tamamata miriyari (50.000) teiteri memeuyutakwiwawekai tsepa tita mete'i'iti, memiyuwairiyakai memiyutakwiniki Rawiri hetsiemieme.
Nepitalhari nuiwarimama nepiyupaimekai: xeimiriyari mepihikitikai memanuyetei, miki yuxexuiti menjwani'akai xeitewiyari
heimana tamamata heimana 'atahuta miriyari (37.000) teiteri, yuhetsie nunuvame meta pitsika me'u'ikame.
Rani nuivarimama mekaniyupaimekaitini: xeitewiyari heimana 'atahaika miriyari heimana 'ataxewime tsienituyari (28.600) kuyaxi memiyuwairiyakai memiyutakwiniki.
'Atsexi nuivarimama mekaniyupaimekaitini: huta tewiyari miriyari teiteri kuyaki memiha'aritsiekai.

Hipatita nuivarite Kurutani 'anutaiye memitamakai tatsiari Xuweni nuivarimama meta Kahari nuivarimama meta hixiata me'ati Manatsexi nuivarimama mekaniyupaimekaitini: xeitsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari miriyari (120.000) teiteri mete'upiti tita kuyaxa mireuyevetse.

Yunaiti miki kuyaxi meyuwairiyati memiyutakwiniki mekanekine Hewuruni paiti, mana Rawiri memanuukakeniki ti'aitame memeyetitaniki naitsarie 'Izaheri kwieyaritsie miemeki. Hipatita 'ixaheritsixi menjwarutinii yunaiti Rawiri mekananukakeni.
Hiki Rawiri waruta'iwawiyaka kuyaxi xeimiriyari meta kuyaxi xeitsienituyari memitewa'aitiatika meta yunaiti memanuyetei,

mipai katiniwarutahiawe 'ixaheritsixi yunaime memiyuxeiriekai: «xika 'aixia'aneni, xika Yawé takakaiyari mipai tinakeni, tepiwata'inieni yunaime 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie memitama, meta mawari wewiwanete metatsiere rewitsixi xexuime kiekaritetsie memeutitei, meketatsi'utinini
Kakaayari tiratuya kakuniyari temikweiyuki temi'atianiki. Yuriki Tsahuri miti'aitakaitsiepaititi tepikahe'eriwa».
Kemitiwarutahiawixi yunaiti teiteri piwarunakixi, hiki yunaiti yamekaniutyuani mipai mitiyiniki.

Hiki Rawiri yunaime kaniwarukuxeirieni 'ixaheritsixi, Tsikuxi 'Ekipitu kwieyari maka'atikatsie paiti meye'atikaime meta Rewu-Kamati paiti meye'atikaime, Kakaayari tiratuya kakuniyari memikweiyuki Kiriati-Yeharini paiti mekatei.
Hiki Rawiri meta yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi mekanekine Wará paiti, Kiriati-Yeharini titi Kura kwieyaritsie, mana memiyekweniki
Kakaiyari tiratuya kakuniyari, miktisie Yawé mutahiawar:wa yutetiamete watsata miti'aita.
Tiratu kakuniyari kaxeta hekwametsie mekanikateni, 'Awinarawi kie mekaneyekweni. 'Utsa meta 'Akiluu kaxeta mekaniuni'aximekaitini.

Rawiri meta yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi Kakaiyari hixie mekaniuhukaitini waikawa meyuttemannawieti meta me'utilxwiti, mete'ukayuitiwati, me'ukanariwiximeti, me'ukaitsawiximeti, meta kuxineta me'uhitsiximeti.
Kiruni kwieyatsie me'uyehuti, triiku matihenatsie, tuurutsixi kwietsanamete mekanekaxirieni, hiki 'Utsa yumamateki tiratu kakuniyari kaniutuika 'anatiweniki.
Yawé kaniuyeha'ani 'Utsa hetsiemieme tiratu kakuniyari mumayiaki, 'ana kwit:wa kanimieni.
'Ana Rawiri kaniuyeha'ani Yawé 'Utsa mumiki. 'Ayumieme mana Peretsi-Utsa katini-uter:wa, hiki 'akuxi mipai pirakutewa.
'Ana Rawiri Kakaiyari heumakati mipai kani-utayini: «Nepikahenukweniri Kakaiyari tiratuya kakuniyari».
'Ayumieme Rawiri yukiekaritisie pikaheiti, matsi mipai katiniu'aita 'Uweri-'Erumi kie manukweiyaniki, Kahati kiekame hetsia.
T'aitame Hirami Tiru kiekame, yuni'arima Rawiri kaneni'arieni mete'utikime kariuxa kiyeyari, meta kil wewiwamete metastsiere kiyeki te'uximayatamete paratsiyuya memitawewieniki.
Mikiki Rawiri mipai katinetimani kename Yawé, yuteiterima wanaki'erieti, 'enukake 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie mitl'aitaniki, meta mariweme hayeitiaximekai hakewa mire'aita.
Rawiri hipameta 'ukari kaniwarutiwitini Kerutsaremekiekariyaritsie,miki wahamatiatiiri kaniwarayexeiya 'ukitsi 'ukari.
Mipai mepitetewakai 'ukitsi miwarayexei: Tsamuha, Tsuwawi, Natani, Tsarumuni,
'Iwikaxi, 'Eritsuha, 'Eripereti,
Nuka, Nepeki, Kapiha,
'Eritsama, Weriyara meta 'Eripereti.
Hiki kepauka memite'utamari piritsiteutsixi kename Rawiri hanukakeriekai 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie ti'aitame mayaniki, mekanayekine me'itamienike. Peru Rawiri yakatinetimani wahepa kaneyani.
'Ari piritsiteutsixi Xepahini mayeweritsie hipame wahetsia mekanitahaxialkatiniri.
Hiki 'ayumieme Rawiri Kakaiyari mipai katiniuta'iwawiya: «Netiyiwe piritsiteutsixi nemiwatakwini? Penetiparewieni nemiwara'iwaki? Yawé mipai katinitaleiya:
Keniwarutakuya, ne nekameniparewimiki pemiwaraiwaki».

Hiki Rawiri mekanekine Wahari-Peratsini paiti, mana Rawiri kaniwaraiwa. Hiki Rawiri mipai kaniutayini mana: «Kakaiyari peutaha meminetsi'aye'unie watsata haa waikawa mitirikaive hepai». 'Ayumieme mana Rawiri Wahari-Peratsini katiniuteriwa.
Mana piritsiteutsixi yukakaiyarixima mekaniwaruku'eirieni, hiki miki mekaniuttiaiyarieni Rawiri mipai tiuta'aitaku.
Piritsiteutsixi tawarita hekwameki mayewer-itsie kiekatari mekaniwarutakwini.

'Ayumieme tawarita Rawiri Kakaiyari kaniutahiave, mikita mipai katinita'eiya: «Wahixie pe'uyame pepikayiwe, wawarita pita kenemie waritsamu kiyexiyari mati'upaiti, hiki mana xekeniwaretakuya wa'utima memihu meri».

Kepauka yuariya peme'enieni kuyaxi muwa memeuhuni hepai, wapaiti kiyexi kitsita, 'ana xekanayekinikuni xemiwaretakwiniki, miki pi'iniaritini kename ne Kakaiyari 'ahixie ne'umie kuyaxi piritsiteutsixi nemiwakwiniki».
Mipai Rawiri katiniuyurieni, Kakaiyari kemirehiawekai, kuyaxi piritsiteutsixi yunalme mekaniwarukwini Kawahuni huyeyari 'utima meta Ketsehexi huyeyari 'utima paiti.
Merikite Rawiri ki yuhetsiemieme kaniuti wewieni Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie, zeimeta kaniutawewieni 'ixuriki kiyari, tiratu kakuniyari hetsiemieme.
Hiki mipai kaniutayini: «Rewitsixi xeikia nepiyiwawe Kakaiyari tiratuya kakuniyari memukweiximeniki, miki Yawé kaniwaranayexeiya mipai memite'uximayakaki yuheyemeki».
Hiki Rawiri 'ixaheritsixi yunaime kaniwarukuxeirieni Kerutsareme Yawé tiratuya kakuniyari memi'atianiki hakewa 'aixia mirekuyuriekai hetsiena mieme.
Metatsiere 'Aruni nuiwarimama kani-warukuxeirieni meta rewitsixi. 'Ipai yupaimeme kaniwaruta'inieni:
Kuhati nuiwarimama, xeitsieniuyari heimana xeitewiyari mepihikitikai, 'Uriheri piwani'akai miki yu'iwama.
Merari nuiwarimama, huta tsieniuyari heimana xeitewiyari mepiyupaimekai, 'Atsahiyaxi yu'iwama muwani'a pihikitikai.
Keritsuni nuiwarimama, xeitsieniuyari heimana xeitewiyari heimana tamamata mepiyupaimekai yunaiti, wa'iwa Kuheri mitiwa'aitia pihikitikai.
'Eritsapani nuiwarimama, huta tsieniuyari mepiyupaimekai, wa'iwa Tsemahiyaxi muwani'a pihikitikai.
Hewuruni nuiwarimama, nauka tewiyari mepihikitikai, 'Eriheri muwani'a pikikitikai yu'iwama.
'Utsiheri nuiwarimama, xeitsienituyari heimana tamamata heimana huta meptyupaimekai, 'Aminarawi muwani'a pihikitikai miki yu'iwama.
Meta Rawiri mawari wewiwamete katiniwarutani'airieni, Tsaruki meta 'Awiyataxi, meta rewitsixi 'Uriheri, 'Atsahiyaxi, Kuheri, Tsemahiyaxi, 'Eriheri meta 'Aminarawi,

hiki mipai katiniwarutahiawe: «Xeme rewitsixi xemiwa'ukiyarimaki, xeme 'aixia zekeneuyuyurieka Kakaiyari hetsia metatsiere yu'iwama, Yawé 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya, tiratuya kakuniyari xemikwelyuki, temi'atianiki hakewa 'aixia nemirekuyuri hetsiena mieme.
Matiari tepikaxe'uta'ini xeme, tameta Yawé takakaiyari tepika'uta'iwawiyaxi, yemeki kemireuyewetse, 'ayumieme miki puyeha'a tahepaitsita».
Meriktie mawari wewiwamete meta rewitsixi 'aixia mekaniuyuyurieni Yawé tiratuya kakuniyari memikwelyuki, 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya.
Hiki rewitsixi mekaneikweni yunaiparitsie Kakaiyari tiratuya kakuniyari, Yawé Muitsexi kemitluta'aitiakai.

Hiki Rawiri rewitsixi wa'ukiyarima katiniwaruta'aitiani kwikamete memiwaranuka'ultianiki, yu'iwamatime kwikari witsi'anuyineme memuttikwikaniki 'aripaki, kanariteki, meta tepia mixikirawi muttitiririka.
'Ayumieme Rewitsixi Hemani Kuheri nu'aya mekananukakeni, meta 'Atsahapi Werekiyaxi minu'ayatikai, meta 'Etani Kutsahiyaxi nu'aya, Merari nuiwarimama.

Metatsiere mekaniwaranuka'ultiani wa'iwama waparewiwanete memakineki, hipati miki tuki kitenie tehiwenete mepihikitikai: Tsakariyaxi Katsiheri nu'aya, Tsemiramuti, Kehieri, Unihi, 'Eriyawi, Wenahiyaxi, Matsehiyaxi, Matatiyaxi, 'Eriperehu, Mikiniyaxi, 'Uweri-'Erumi meta Keyeri.
Memutikwika: Hemani, 'Atsahapi meta 'Etani wurunitse tepiayariki mixikirawi mutitiririkaki mepite'ukayultiwakai.
Tsakariyaxi, 'Atsiheri, Tsemiramuti, Kehieri, 'Unihi, 'Eriyawi, Matsehiyaxi meta Wenahiyaxi kanariteki mepukakanariwiwakai.
Matatiyaxi, 'Eriperehu, Mikiniyaxi, 'Uweri-'Erumi, Keyeri meta 'Atsatsiyaxi, miki 'aripa mepu'ikai 'atahaikati pirime manutiwi kwikamete memiwaruwitiximeniki.
Kenaniyaxi rewitsixi wa'ukiyari, waikawa mitimaiwekaiki, kwikamete piwaranukuwitikikai.
Werekiyaxi 'Erikana matia kitenie tehiwenete mepihikitikai tiratu kakuniyari muwayekatsie.

Mawari wewiwanete Tsewaniyaxi, Kutsapati, Natanaheri, 'Amatsahi, Tsakariyaxi, Wenahiyaxi meta 'Eriyetsexi, kuxineta meputihitsiwakai tiratu kakuniyari hixie meti'uti. 'Uweri-'Erumi meta Kehiyaxi miktatsiere kitenie tehiwenete tiratu kakuniyari muyeka
mepihikitikai.
Waikawa meyutemannawieti, Rawiri meta 'ukirawetsixi 'ixaheritsixi wa'ukiyarima, meta kuyaxi memanuyttei xeimiriyari memitewa'aitiatika, Yawé tiratuya kakuniyari mekanekukweni 'Uweri-'Erumi kie paiti.
Kakaiyari rewitsixi muwaparewiekaiki Yawé tiratuya kakuniyari memukweiximeniki, tururutsixi mekanivaruttinawa 'atahuta meyupaimeme meta muxatsi 'ukitsi wahepai meyupaimeme.

Rawiri rinu witsimi'ane 'ixurikiyari kananakatikikaitini, yaxelkiata yunaiti rewitsixi tiratu kakuniyari memukweiximekai, meta kwikamete meta Kenaniyaxi kwikamete mitiva'aitia. Metatsiere Rawiri penakatikikai mawari wewiwanne kamixaya 'etsiminena.

Hiki temawierika hiwariyaritsata meta muxatsi wa'avate 'uthitisleriwakaku meta kuxinetate, tepia mixikirawi mutitiririka,'aripatetsie meta kanarite tiutiyuanekaku, yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi Yawé tiratuya kakuniyari mekaniukweiximekaitini.
Kakaiyari tiratuya kakuniyari kani'atiarieni Rawiri hakewa 'ixuriki kiyari meta'aitakai. Muwa mekaneitateni hiki mawari taiyariyari
mekaniuwewieni meta meniyuxewiniki mawariyari Kakaiyari hixie.
'Arike mawari heutipareku, Rawiri Yawé kani-utawawirieni teiteri 'aixia niwayurieniki
meta 'ixaheritsixi yuxexuime 'ukitsi meta 'ukari paa kaniwaruta'iitiani meta taki takari tsuirayari, meta kaxie patsaruyari tsuirayari.

Hiki Rawiri hipame rewitsixi Yawé tiratnya kakuniyari kaniwaruhiritiani hetsiena mieme memite'uximayakaki, pamipariyutsi memipitiakaki meta witsimemutiyuaneniki Yawé hepaitsita, 'Ixaheri kakaiyarieya.

Memanayexeiyarie mepihikitikai: 'Atsahapi mexiakame pihikitikai: Tsakariyaxi, hutarieka mieme pihikitikai: manatari mepihikitikai Kekiyeri, Tsemiramuti, Kehieri, Matatiyaxi, 'Eriyawi, Wenahiyaxi, 'Uweri-'Erumi meta Keyeri, miki 'aripaki teyuitiwamete mepihikitikai meta kanariteki. 'Atsahapi tepia mutttiririka piyuitiwametikai.
Mawari wewiwamete Wenahiyaxi meta Ka-hatsieri matia kuxineta meputihitisiwakai Yawé tiratnya kakuniyari hixie.
Miki tukartisie, matiari piyianekai Rawiri kwikari miyetia 'Atsahapi meta 'iwamama wa-hetsia 'iki niawari Yawé hetsiemieme.
«'Aixia xekenaitikani Yawé hetsiemieme, kemitimarive xekenekuxatani, xekenekuxatani kemituyuri teiteri watsata.
Xekeneutikwikani, niawari hetsiena mieme. zekenekuxatani mariwemeki kemitluyuri.
Xekeneyutemannawieka mimariwe mipatsie xe-mexeiyaki. xekeneyutemannawieka yuriki Yawé xemikuwautiwe.
Yawé hetsia xekeneyu'awietani mitirukaiyeki, yazeketenahiaweni yuheyemeki.
Xekenaye'eriwani mariwemeki kemitluyuri, 'iniari kemitluwewi meta 'aitsika ke'aneneme miyetia.
»'Ixaheri nuiwarimama, Yawé ti'uximayatsiriwame Kakuwu niwemama, Yawé mixe'anayexei:
Yawé takakaiyari pihiki, naitsarie kwiepa katini'aitani kemitlheitserie.
Miki yutirati yuhemeki kana'eriwani, xeimiriyari nuiwariyari wahamatia yuniuki kaniyetiani.
'Apirahami matia tiratu kemitluwewi, meta 'Itsahaki matia kemitluyuhiritia,
Kakuwu yakatiniutahiawe, 'aitsika kaneyeitiirieni, 'ixaheritsixi wahetsiemieme tiratu yuheye- meki mieme kanayeitiani:
Eki Kanani kwieyari nekamaniyetuiriemiki, piinitiarika 'ahetsiemieme mihikitini hepai».
Kepauka 'akuxi temikatamiirekai, tewatari tekanihimetikaitini yaki teyupaimeti miki kwieyaritsie,
kepauka hipame kwieyaritetsie xemu'tuwakai
meta kepauka hipame te'aitamete wahetsia xemu'uvakai,
Kakaiyari pikatiiupitia wairiyarika temifeta'aitiarieniki, te'aitamete kaniwarutatieni 'iya wanaki'erieti:
Neteiterima nemiwaranayexei xepikawa'uximatiaka. Neniukamete xepikatewakwinitiaka».
Yunaiti teiteri kwiepa memitama Yawé mekeniawani. Meke'ikuxatani tukari miyehane kemitiyuvikweitsitiwa.
Nuiwarite watsata kekenekuxatani witsikemi'ane, meta marivremeki kemitiyuriene kekenekux­atani yunalme teiteri watsata.
Yawé matsi kanimariveni, hetsiena pitinake witsimitikihiawariwani, matsi waikawa makaxiwati keyuri hipati kakaiyarixi.
Tixaiti mepikatehiki teiteri wakakaiyarixi, matsi Yawé muyuawi kaniutawewieni,
Xawatiriya meta kemitimarive hixiena kanixu-aweni, temawierika kanixuaweni meta tirikariya tukieya muyepatsieta.
Yawé xeketeneyetuiri, yunaiti teiteri, Yawé yaxeketeneutahiawi witsikemi'ane meta kemittirikaige.
Yawé yaxeketeneutahiawi witsikemi'ane minariveki,
hixiena kekeneu'axia 'imikieri xete'epinirieti, Yawé xekenayexeiyani tukieya witsimi'aneta.
Yunaiti teiteri kwiepa memitama meke'eyemakaxeni. Miki kwie 'apuyeye, mikita pikakuyuani.
Muyuawi keyutemawieka meta kwie ke'utanaweni. nuiwarite mipai meke'utiyuani: Yawé piti'aitame».
Haramara ke'utayuaneni meta yunaiti mana memiteye'uwa. 'fisi keyutemawieka meta tita mana memitexiawe.
Kiyexi hiritsie mieme ke'utikwikani temawierikaki Yawé hixie, miki 'ukanamieni kwiepa tita'aitake.

Merikitsi Rawiri yuparatsiyuta 'ayekaitiri Natani kakaiyari niukameya mipai katiniutahiawe: Neuxei, 'aixia pika'ane ne kariuxa paratsiyuyarita nemayekani, Yawé tiratuya kakuniyari 'ixuriki tukiyarita hayekaikaku».
Natani mipai katinita'eiya: «'Aixia pi'ane, yaketineuyuri 'aiyaritsie kepemiti'akuhiawe, Kakaiyari 'ahamatia kaniuyeikani».
Peru miki tikariyaritsie Kakaiyari niukieya Natani hetsie kaninuani mipai katinitahiawe:
Kenemie Rawiri neti'uximayatsiriwanne mipai ketinetaxatia kename Yawé ne mipai nehaine: Eki pepikahikitini kii pemitawewieni muwa ne nemayekaniki».
Meripaiti 'ixaheritsixi nemiwarayewititsietiti meta hiki 'akuxi kiita nepikahayeyeriwe, matsi 'ixuriki tukiyarita xelkia ne'ayekaiti nepukuyeikakai.
Kepauka 'ixaheritsixi wahamatia nemuyeikakai, kepauka 'itsikate nemiwarutani'a, neteiterima nemiwaiwiyaniki, ne nuki nepikawarutati kariuxa kiyari newa'altiati».
Ayumieme, Rawiri neti'uximayatsiriwanne mipai ketinetahiawi, Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye mipai paine: Ne muxatsi wakuraruta nepimatsi'aye'ini, neteiterima 'ixaheritsixi pita pemitiwata'altianiki.

Ne 'ahamatia nepuyelkakai tsepa hakewa pemuyelkakai, meyunalme nepiwaruka'unaxi kemi'ane memimatsi'aye'uniekai. Hikiri waikawa pemariweme nekamanayetitamiki, 'ena kwiepa hipati memimamariwawc wahepai.

Yaxelkiatatsiere kwie nekanikuha'aritiamiki neteiterima 'ixaheritsixi wahetsiemieme, mana nemiwaka'eni hepai nepiwayurieni mana nepititeni mekamariutsieti. 'Axamemite'u'iyari mepikaxe'uximatianiri kememixeyuriekai tsutiapai,

kepauka 'itsikate nemiwaranuka'uitia neteiterima wahetsie 'ixaheritsixi. Meta mipai nekamatinalniaweni, ne yunalme memimatsi'aye'unie nekaniwaka'unamiki, metatsiere ne, Yawé, nekamanipitiamiki 'anuiwari pehexeiyati pemayaniki.
Kepauka pemikumawere 'atewarima memakulhe pemiyemie, ne xeime 'aniwetime nekananukakemiki 'ahetsiemieme, mikita nepiparewieni heitserie mitita'aitaki.
Miki katiniyuriemiki kii mitawewieni nehetsiemieme, neta nekaniparewimiki yuheyemeki mitita'aitaki.
Ne nepu'ukiyarieyatini, mikita pineniwetini. Hatsuaku ne'inaki'erieti nepika'ilayewa, meripaiti 'ayeta mitiuta'aitaxi kenemitihayewaxi.
Matsi, miki yuheyemeki nekie nepihirita meta nemira'aitatsie meta hiki yuheyemeki piti'aitani».
Natani 'iki tinaime Rawiri katiniutaxatiani, kemitülhekiatsitiiyarie yemeki.

Hiki t'aitame Rawiri 'ixuriki tukiyarita kan inuani tiratu kakuniyari muyeka, hiki Yawé hixie mipai kanlutayini: Yawé pemikakaiyari, ne tixaiti nepikatihiki meta netiiriyama, titayari nemariweme penerayetiiva.

Yawé nekakaiyari, ¿ketitayari waikawa matsi penetiyexatia penetiyetuiriekattirri, meta kename yuheyemeki nenuiwarima 'aixia pewayurieka? wa'attii ne tewi mimariwe nepitihiki pepinetsiyuriene, Yawé Kakaiyari 'aku.
¿Ketsikuta tawari ne ne'utayini ke'aixia peminetixeiyaki, 'ektisi pekanenimateni ne ti'a'uximayatsiriwame?
Yawé, 'eki 'iki naime mitimamariwawe pekatiniyurieneni, ne ti'a'uximayatsiriwame peminetsinaki'erieki, mipai mimatinakeki, meta matsi kime pekatinayetitani miki.
Yawé, tame yatepitchetima 'alepai tiuka'iyariti pumawe, meta tawarita xewiti 'alepai Kakaiyari pumawe.

Pumawe 'ateiterima 'Ixaheri nuiwariyari walepai me'aneti. Miki nuiwari xelkia nepihiki pemiwaranayexei 'ena kwiepa, 'ateiterima pemiwarayetitaniki, meta kepemitimariwe pemi'ahekiataki wahetsiemieme. Kepauka 'Ekipitu pemiwarayewiti 'ateirima, huyeta mamariwaweme peptituyuri meta hipame nuiwarite pepiwarayewei meta wakakaiyarizi.
'Ixaheritsixi 'ahetsiemieme pepiwarayeitia 'ateiterima memakineki yuheyemeki, 'ekita Yawé, wakakaiyari pemihikitiniki.
Kamitsi Yawé, kepemititahiawixi mati'uximayatsiriwame meta nuiwarimama wahetsiemieme, mipai ketinaye'atia 'aniuki,

kepemitimarive pemaleriwaniki 'aixia pemirahiawariwaniki yuheyemeki, meta yunaiti mipai memutiyuameniki: Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye 'ixaheritsixi wakakaiyari kanihikitini. Hiki 'ana Rawiri ti'a'uximayatsiriwame nuiwarimama mematsi'ayexeiyati mekaniu'uwakuni.
Eki nekakaiyari, ne ti'a'uximayatsiriwame pekanetiniutaxatiani kename nenuiwarima te'aitamete pewarayeitiani, 'ayumieme ne ti'a'uximayatsiriwame nepiyuwairi 'ipai nemimatitahiaweki.
Yawé, Kakaiyari 'eki pepihiki, 'eki peptittaxatia ke'aixia pemiyurieni ti'a'uximayatsiriwame.

'Aixia peptitwaruxei ti'a'uximayatsiriwame nuiwarimama 'aixia pemiwayurieniki, pewa'uwiyakaku yuheyemeki 'amemu'uwaniki. 'Eki Yawé 'aixia pepiwaruyuri, 'ayumieme 'aixia me'itiarieti nepiyuhayewa yuheyemeki».
Merikitsi yapaimexia tukari 'anuka.yaku, Rawiri piritsiteutsixi kaniwarutakwini kaniwara'iwa, tiwa'aitiati kanayani meta
wakiekari kaniwarunawairieni Kahati meta 'auriena kiekari mamanetika.
Yaxelkiata muhawitsixi kaniwara'iwa, hiki Rawiri tiwa'aitiati kanayani, hetsiana meteyukutuayati mekanakine.
Metatsiere Rawiri Harari-Etsexi kana'iwa ti'aitame Tsuwa kiekame, Kamati kwieyaritsie, kepauka miki 'Eupirate kwieyaritsie mitamiekai 'aixia 'iyurienike mana miti'aitaniki.

Rawiri kaninawairieni xeimiriyari kaxetate kuyaxa miemete, 'atahuta miriyari kuyaxi memutei kawayutsixi wabetsie, meta xeitewiyari miriyari kuyaxi yu'ikama memuhukai, meta kawayutsixi tirutari puwaruti'ikamiraxia, puwaruhayewaxi xelkia xeitsientiuyari kaxetate wabetsiemieme.
Meta kepauka tsiriyutsixi Ramatsiku kiekatari memu'axia ti'aitame Harari-Etsexi Tsuwa kiekame preparewienike, miki Rawiri kaniwarukwini xeitewiyari heimana huta miriyari meyupaimeme.
Hiki Ramatsikutsie kuyaxi tehiwemete kaniwaru'uitiani, mikita tsiriyutsixi meteyukutuayati Rawiri hetsia mekanakine. Naitsarie Rawiri kemitiyumienekai katinayu'iwakatini, Yawé niparewiekaiki.
Huru tepiayari kimana memiyukumaruma memi'ikai Harari-Etsexi parewiwanete 'ahurawa memuti'u, Rawiri yupiini katinayeitiani Kerutsaremee paiti katinetini.
Metatsiere waikawa wurunitse kaniukaxeiya, Tewaki kiekariteyaritsie muxiawekai, meta Kuni kiekariyaritsie, Harari-Etsexi mikiekariteyatikai.
Miki wurunitse kaniuyurieni Tsarumuni mitivewi haa makamare katsu 'emiyewa, keuruwite tuki hixie miti'ukai meta hipatita pitimirekai wurunitseki mitiwewiyatikatei tukita timieme.
Tuhu, Kamati kiekariyaritsie ti'aitame, katiniutamarieni kename Rawiri, Tsuwa kvieyaritsie ti'aitame Harari-Etsexi ha'iwakai.

Meta ti'aitame Tuhu Harari-Etsexi paye'uniekai, 'ayumieme yuniwe 'Arurani kaneni'ani ti'aitame Rawiri hetsia meitawairitianiki, Harari-Etsexi ma'iwaziki. Meta Tuhu katineini'airiekaitini 'mikierite piinite huruki mitiwewiyatika, pirataki meta wurunitseki.
Hiki miki 'mikieri naime ti'aitame Rawiri Yawé katiniyetuirieni, yaxelkia kemituyuriekai 'Erumi kvieyaritsie mireyetiikai meta Muhawi, 'Amuni, Piritsiteu kvieyari meta 'Amareki kvieyaritsie.
Meta 'Awitsahi Tsariwiya nu'aya 'erumitsixi kaniwarai'wa Mayeveri Maye'unaya mirayetewatsie, mana kaniwarukwini tamamata heimana 'atahaika miriyari.

Yaxelkiatatsiere 'Erumi kiekariyaritsie kuyaxi tehiwemete kaniwaru'uitiani, 'ana 'erumitsixi Rawiri hetsia meteyukutuayati mekanakine. Naitsarie kemitiyumienekai Rawiri, Yawé kaniparewiekaitini mirayu'iwaki.
Kuhawi Tsariwiya nu'aya kuyaxi tiwa'altiwame manuyeka pihikitikai, Kutsapati 'Akiruri nu'aya ti'utiwame pihikitikai.
Tsaruki 'Akituwi nu'aya meta 'Akimereki 'Awiyataxi nu'aya, miki mawari wewiwamete mepihikitikai, Tsawitsa kemitiuyi ti'utiwame pihikitikai.
Yapainexia 'anuyeyaku, Nakaxi kaniumini 'amunitsixi tiwa'altiwame, nu'aya pita kanitsutiani ti'aitati.

'Ana Rawiri mipai katiniu'erieni: «'Aixia 'anemeki tepiyuxeiyani Kanuni Nakaxi nu'aya matia, 'ukiyarieya matia 'aixia ketemiteyuxeiyakai». Hiki yuni'arima kaniwareni'ani memeinitianiki Rawiri hetsiemieme 'ukiyarieya mumikalki. Kepauka Rawiri ni'arimama memu'axia 'amunitsixi wakwieyaritsie Kanuni mekunitiativeti.

Hiki memanuyyetei 'amunitsixi mipai mekateneyemarttiani ti'aitame: «Yuri petiwa'eririe 'eki ti'aitame, kename Rawiri wareyeni'a memimatsinitianiki xelkia 'a'ukiyari hetsiemieme? Matsitsi 'iki mekaniku'avienieretiweni takiekaritsie 'arike me'ika'unake».
Merikite Kanuni katiniuta'aita Rawiri ni'arimama memitiwiyarieniki meta wamixiya
mataxiriexianiki meta wakamixate manutsanariexianiki hixiapa, mehanamanaweti mekaneni'arieni yu'utima.

Rawiri ni'arimama yemekimekaniyutetewiyakatini. Kepauka Rawiri mituttamari kememite'anuyeki, niuki kaneni'ani mipai haineme yuhetsiemieme: «Keriku kekeneyuhayewa, kepaukake xemixiya metiwawere kekanahuni».

Kepauka Kanuni meta 'amunitsixi memitehetima Rawiri ke'axamemuynriekai, 'ana kwiti xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana haika miriyari kiruyari raheteme pirata mekaneni'ani Metsuputamiya* palti, meminitiarieniki kaxetate meta kuyaxi kawayutsixi wahetsie memutei, metastiere 'Arami-Mahaka kiekatari meta Tsuwa kiekatari.

Kaxetate kuyaxa miemete xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana huta miriyari paimeneki mekatenayukatuani memiparewiyaniki meta ti'aitame Mahaka kiekame mekaniuta'inieni kuyaximama yunaime, miki Merewa murakutewa hixie mekanitiyaxe. Meta 'amunitsixi mekanayekine yukiekaritetsie mekaniuyukuha'aritiani memiyutakwiniki.
Kepauka Rawiri mipai niretima, Kuhawi kaneni'ani yunaime kuyaxi warawitikime.
Hiki 'amunitsixi mekanekine yukiekari kitenie mekanitiyaxe, hipattia te'aitamete memuta'iniriekai 'ateewa mitahekiatsie mekanitiyaxe.
Kepauka Kuhawi yamiretima kementie'uniwakai yuhixie meta yu'utima, 'ayumieme kanivaranuyeteixi kuyaxi 'ixaheritsixi yemeki memiyiwawe tsiriyutsixi memiwatakwiniki,
memuyuhayewaxi kuyaxi yumuta 'Awitsahi kaniuhiritiani 'amunitsixi memiwatakwiniki.
Kuhawi 'Awitsahi mipai katiniuhiritiani: «Xika tsiriyutsixi menetsihai'wani 'eki pekaneniparewimiki. Xikata 'amunitsixi mematsihai'wani ne nekameniparewimiki.
Pepikamaka, tateiterima wahetsiemieme tekaniyutakwikuni meta takakaiyari kiekariteya hetsiemieme. Yawé yaketiuyurieni kehapai mikimitinale».
Hiki Kuhawi meta kuyaximama tsiriyutsixi mekanivarutakwini, peru tsiriyutsixi Kuhawi mekaniuttinakani mekaniuyuta'una.
'Amunitsixi me'uneniereka tsiriyutsixi kememiteyuta'unakai mikita mekaniyuta'una 'Awitsahi memakati yukiekartisie mekaniyuti'awieta. Hiki Kuhawi Kerutsaremee kanakunuani.

Hiki tsiriyutsixi 'ixaheritsixi mewara'iwaku, niuki mekaneni'ani 'Eupirate 'anutaiye yu'iwama tsiriyutsixi wahetsia. Tsupaki pihikitikai Harari-'Etsexi kuyaximama tiwa'aitiwame, miki kananuyeyerini wahetsiemieme.

Kepauka Rawiri mitiutamari 'ixaheritsixi yunalme kanivarukuxerireni, hiki Kurutani hatuxameyari 'anutaiye mekananukine, hiki mana 'aixia mekateniuyu'uitiani tsiriyutsixi mewatakwinike. Hiki tsiriyutsixi mekanitsutiani mekanivarutakwini,

peru miyatiti mekaniuyuta'una 'ixaheritsixi mewamakati. Rawiri kaniwarukwini 'atahuta miriyari kuyaxi tsiriyutsixi kawayutsixi wahetsie memutekai meta huta tewiyari miriyari kuyaxi yi'ikama memuhukai, metatsiere Tsupaki kaniu-mieni kuyaxi wa'ukiyari.
