Meriktisi taxarita kepauka te'aitamete memayekikatsie, Kuhawi kanayeyani yukuyax-ima warawitti, hiki 'amunitsixi wakwieyaritsie meye'axiaka mekaniwarakuyuniya. Metatsiere Xawaha kiekariyaritsie paiti mekaniye'axiani, mekaniwarutakwini mekanika'una. Peru Rawiri Kerutsarenne kanekunuakatitini.

'Amunitsixi tiwa'aitiwame huru mumayari manamakai Rawiri kanimawairieni, xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana haika kiruyari pirahetekai, tetexi witsimi'anene peukutetikaitei. Hiki Rawiri pita mekananutiketsirieni. Metatsiere miki kiekariyaritsie waikawa mekatenayetini piinitiarika miraye'atika.
Hiki Rawiri mana Xawaha kiekatari wairiyarika te'uximayatamete kaniwarayeitiani,
kiyexi xitekemete, tepia manuxiteki te'uximayatamete meta ki'ewemete. Yaxelkiata kaniwaruyurieni 'amuultsixi teiteriyari, hiki 'arike Kerutsareme kanakunuani yunaime yukuyaxima warawititi.

Merikitsi miyatiuyiku tawarita piritsiteutsixi wahamatia mekaniuyutakwini Ketsehexi mirakutewatsie. 'Ana Tsivekahi Kutsa kiekame Tsipahi kaniumieni, miki 'amemutiti wanuiwari pihikitikai. Mipai 'ixaheritsixi mekateniwara'iwa piritsiteutsixi.
Metatsiere hutarieka mewarutakwiku piritsiteutsixi, 'Erikanani Yahixi nu'aya Rakimi kaniumieni, Kuriyati Kahati kiekame 'iwaya, miki pitsika pakwekai 'epakame.

Tawarita mekaniuyutakwini Kahati kiekariyaritsie. Manata xewiti 'ememutiti kaniukateitini, miki yumamatetsie yu'ikatetsie 'ataxexuime pexeiyatikatei yumamate tiirixi, tatsiari xeitewiyari heimana nauka yumamate tiirixi pexeiyakai.
Miki 'ixaheritsixi wahixie piyutamarivekatakan, peru Kunatani Tsimaha nu'aya, tatsiari Rawiri 'iwaya, miki kanimieni.
Merikite kauyumarie 'ixaheritsixi waraye'unieti kanayani Rawiri kaniuyuitiani kuyaxi niivatti'iniataki.

'Ayumieme Rawiri Kuhawi nipai katiniuta'aitiani, meta teiteri memanuyetei: —Xekenehu kuyaxi xekeniwareti'iniata Wer- itsewa xe'itsutiame 'atsita Rani meye'atikaime, yanemiretimaniki keyupaimeti memiyiwawe kuyaki meminete'uximayatsiriekaki.

Kuhawi nipai katinita'eiya: —Matsi Yawé kewarutimiriya zeitsienituyari mexia 'ateiterima. Mikiriki yunaiti mepi'ateiterima, ¿peru ketitayarikuta 'akuxi petimalmiki ketemitapaime, ti'aitame? Miya pemitiyurimiki 'ateiterima 'ixaheritsixi 'axapewaruyurieni zeikia.
Matsi ti'aitame niukieya kananu'enierieni keyuri Kuhawi, hiki 'ayumieme kanayeyani naitsarie 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie. 'Ariketa kanakunuani Kerutsareme,

hiki 'ana Rawiri katiniyetuirieni keyupaimeme muwaraka'utiakai kuyaxi: 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie zeimiyuniyari heimana zeitsienituyari miriyari (1.100.000) mepiyupaimekai, meta Kura kwieyaritsie kiekatari nauka tsienituyari heimana haika tewiyari heimana tamamata miriyari (470.000) mepiyupaimekai.
Peru Kuhawi Rewi nuivarimama pikawaruti'iniataxi meta Wenikamini nuivarimama, Kuhawi hepatitisita 'axami'anekaiki miki ti'aitame 'aitsikaya.
Metatsiere Kakaiyari hepaisita miki 'altsika 'axapianekai, 'ayumieme 'izahertisixi 'axapuwaruyuri.

Hiki Rawiri Kakaiyari mipai katiniutahiawe: «Yemeki waikawa 'axanepitiuyuri 'iki kuyaxi nemiwaruti'iniataxiki. Mika'uka'iyari hepai nepitiuyuri. Nepimatsiwawirie kwerieti netineuyehiwiri ne ti'a'uximayatsiriwame».
Yawé Kahari mipai katiniutahiawe yuniukame, Rawiri hetsiemieme miti'uximayakai:
«Kenemie Rawiri mipai ketinetahiawi, Yawé mipai kanaineni: "Nepimatsipitia xeime pemanayexeiyaki 'iki haikame 'uximatiarikate. Yakenetineutahiawi ke'aneme nepimatsipitiani"».
Hiki Kahari Rawiri hetsia kaneyani mipai katineitahiawe: —Yawé mipai kanaineni: "Iki mihaika ke'aneme pepinakterie:

haika wiyari haakaxa, nutsu haika metseri memike'aye'unie mepixekwitiweni 'ixiparaki, nutsu haika tukari kwiniya pitaweni meta niuki tuayame Yawé hetsia mieme pixekwika naitsarie 'Ixaheri kwieyartisie". Kenetutimaixia yanetineutahiawi neta yanemireitahiaweki kemi'ane minetsiheyeni'a.

Rawiri Kahari mipai katiniuta'eiya: —Yemeki 'atsinepikatiyumaive ke'aneme nemanayexeiya. Matsi 'aixia pi'ane Yawé minetsi'uximatianiki, naki'eriyaya mimariweki, 'aixia pika'ane teiteri xika menetsi'u'uximatiani.
Yawé, 'ayumieme 'Ixaheri kwieyartisie kwiniya kaneni'ani, 'ana haika tewiyari heimana tamamata miriyari (70.000) mekaniukwini 'ıkaheritsizi.

Meta Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie yuniuki tuayame kaneni'animanakiekatari miwakwiniki. Hiki Yawé kepauka mixei wakwineme, kemitiwakwinitiakai piwarutinenimayatası, hiki niuki tuayame mipai katiniutahiawe: «'Ariri. Ketineuhayewa 'ari». 'Ana yemeki, niuki tuayame Yawé hetsia mieme 'Uxinahanikewutseu tewiyari tiriku matihenatsie kaniuwekaitini.

Rawiri kepauka manukunierixi, 'ana niuki tuayame Yawé hetsia mieme kaniuxeiya wapaiti 'uyewiekame, yu'ixipara Kerutsareme hepa heutatserakame. Hiki 'ana Rawiri meta 'ukirawetsizi hiwerika kamixayari me'anakatifikaitimekaniukahixima'unikwiepa.

Hiki Rawiri Kakaiyari mipai katiniutahiawe: «Yawé peminekakaiyari, ne nepitiuyuri nemitiuta'aitaxi nemiti'iniatsieniki teiteri. Miki teiteri 'atsimepikate'uyuri. Nepita nekanihikitini 'axanemi tiuyuri. Nepita netineukwinitia meta netiiriyama, 'ariri 'ateiterima pepikawakwika».

Merikite niuki tuayame Yawé hetsia mieme Kahari mipai katiniutahiawe: «Rawiri mipai ketinetahiawi tenutsari mawari wewiwame Yawé hetsiemieme pitawewieni 'Uxinahanikewutseu tewiyari tiriku matihenatsie».
Hiki Rawiri mana kaneyani miraye'atianiki, Kahari kemittiahiawekai Yawé hetsiemieme.
'U xinahani tiriku mana pu'unekai kaniuxeiya. Meyunaukati niwemama hamatiana memu'uwakai mekaniutinautsa mekaniuyuti'avieta.
Kepauka 'Uxinahani Rawiri muzei kwieya makuma hepa 'amiekame, hepana kanayeyani 'enunakeke, hiki hixiena kaniukahiximakeni.
Hiki Rawiri mipai katinitahiawel: —'Iki 'akwie yayeume keneneutuiri, mana mawari wewiwame Yawé hetsiemieme nemitawewieniki, mitihayewaki kwiniya tatsikwiti teiteri. Keneneutuiri yemeki kemiraye'axe.

'Uxinahani Rawiri mipai katiniutahiawel: —Neti'aitiwame, ne nekamanimimiki, 'eki mana kemimatinale yaketineuyuri. Ne tuurutsixi kwietsanameter nekaniwayetiamiki mawari taiyariyari pemiwarayetitianiki, meta kiyexi tiriku 'uwame nepiyetuani kimana pematinainiki meta tiriku hatsi mawariyari pemayetitianiki. Ne miki tinaime nekametinimikwani.

Peru ti'aitame Rawiri 'Uxinahani mipai ka- tiniutahiawel: —Hawalki mipai 'aixia pika'ane. Yawé nepikatiyetuirieni tita miti'aplini, meta mawari taiyariyari nepikaiwewirieni nekarayukatuame. Naimeki nekatinayukatuamiki kepaimenetsie miti'axe.
Rawiri 'Uxinahani huru tuminiyari 'atax- ewime tsienituyari kaniu'ititiani miki kwieki.

Mana kaniitawewieni mawari wewiwame Yawé hetsiemieme, mana mawari taiyariyari kaniuwewieni meta memiyuxewiniki mawari- yari. Hiki Rawiri kaniuyutanenewieni, 'ana Yawé Kakaiyari kanita'eiya miki mawari hetsie tai kaneyeni'ani muyuawitsie mieme.
Hiki Yawé yuniuki tuayame katiniutaxatiani, miki yu'ixipara muka'utaki.
Rawiri 'uniereka Yawé menu'eniekalki, mana mawari kaniwewirieni.
'Ana 'ixuriki tukiyari Yawé hetsiemieme meta mawari taiyariyari wewiwame Muitsexi mitiwewiekai makumawetsie, Kawahuni paiti pireku'ukai.
Peru Rawiri waikawa heumati Yawé pikaheku'iwawiyaxi mana, niuki tuayame Yawé hetsia mieme 'ixiparaya muxeiki.
Hiki Rawiri mipai kaniutayini: «'Ena Yawé Kakaiyari tukieya kaniyutawewimiki, meta mawari talyariyari wewiwame 'ixaheritsixi mana mawari memitiwewiwaniki».
Merikitsi Rawiri katiniuta'alta tewatari memikuxeiriyaniki 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie memititekai. Miki hipame kaniwaranayexeiya tetexi memilikikinaki kimana Kakaiyari tukieya mitawewiyaniki.
Metatsiere Rawiri waikawa tepia kaniukuxeirieni mikki mittiwewiyaniki kirapuxite meta 'ituparitsie mawiwire, meta waikawa wurunitse kaniukuxeirieni.
Yaxelkiatsiere kariuxa kiyeyari waikawa kaniukuxeirieni, miki Tsirunitari meta Tiru kiekatari kariuxa kiyeyari waikawa meni'atiiriekaitini.

Rawiri mipai pitikuleriwakai: «Neniwe Tsarumuni 'akuxi pitemalki meta pikarakumate, tuki muyutawewieni Yawé hetsiemieme yemeki 'apitimariweni pumariwani naitsarie kwiepa, 'ayumieme tinaine nepitikuha'aritsirieni». Hiki mexi Rawiri 'uyeikakai tinaine katiniukuxerireni.
Hiki yuniwe Tsarumuni 'utakwewieka kanihiritiani tuki mitawewieniki Yawé 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya hetsiemieme.
Rawiri Tsarumuni mipai katiniutahiawe: «Neniwe, ne mipai nepitinekihiawekai tuki nepitawewienikekai Yawé nekakaiyari hetsiemieme.
Peru Yawé mipai kanetiniutahiawe: "Eki nehixie waikawa teiteri pepiwarukwi meta waikawamexia kuyaxa pepiwewienekai, 'ayumieme 'eki tuki pepikatawewieni.

Peru xewiti 'aniwe kayuwati 'uyeikati payani, ne yanepitiyurieni hipati nuiwarite kemi'ane memeye'unieka 'aixia memite'ixeiyaki kayuwati nekaniwapitiamiki, 'ayumieme Tsarumuni katinitewakamiki. Kepauka miki mitita'aita, ne 'ixaheritsixi kayuwati nekaniwapitiamiki meta 'aixia 'iyariki memu'uwaniki.

Miki pitiyurieni tuki mitawewieni nehetsiemieme. Miki mineniwetini hepai nepitimaika, neta nemi'tkiyarieyatini hepai nepi'aneni hetsiena mieme. Meta yanekatiniyuriemiki yuheyemeki nuivarimama memiteta'aitaki 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie".
Hiki 'ayumieme neniwe, Yawé 'akakaiyari kematsiparewieka tukieya pemitawewieniki, yemeki miki kemutayi.
Kematsi'upltiani pemitimalweniki meta pemirakumaikaki, kepauka pemanuyeyerini 'ixaheritsixi wahetsiemieme, 'aitsikaya pemaye'atianiki. Miki Yawe 'akakaiyari kanihikitini.
Xika peheye'aitalka 'aitsikate kemutiyuane Yawé miwayetuirizaheri meta Muitsexi yatikuxatakanku, mipai 'aixia pekatiniuyelkamiki. Petirikaiyeti pepira'lwani. Pepikamaka meta pepikatihayewani.

Neuxei, waikawa netiuta'uximayataka nepitiiukuxerii Yawé tukieya hetsie timieme, haika miyuniyari heimana haika tsienituyari miriyari kiruyari raheteme huru, xeltewiyari heimana tamamata heimana haika miyuniyari kiruyari raheteme pirata, metatsiere wurunitse meta tepia waikawa nekaniukuxerieni kayu'iniatsiniakame. Meta tetexi, yaxeikia kiyexi nekatiniukuxerieni, peru 'ektia matsi waikawa ketinekuwawa.
Metatsiere te'uximayatamete meyuwaikawame: Tetexi xixiwamete, kii wewiwamete, kiyexiki te'uximayatamete, meta naime 'uximayatsikatsie mekatenakumaika,
huruki, pirataki, wurunitseki, meta tepiaki. Meriki keneutsutia ketine'uximayakari Yawe ke- matsiparewieka».
Hiki Rawiri yunaime izaheritsixi wa'ukiyarima kanivaruhiritiani yuniwe Tsarumuni memiparewieniki.

Mipai pitiwarualahiawixi: «Yawé xekakaiyari xehamatia kaniuyeikani, kayuwati kanixepitiaka naitsarie muyehane. Ta'aurie kiekatari kaneniye- tuirieni, meta miki hiki Yawé katiniwa'aitiaka meta xeme teiterimama.

'Ayumieme hiki Yawé yukakaiyari zekeneutiwawa yuriki yemeki yu'iyariki. Xekeneutsutia tuki 'uximayatsikayari Yawé kakaiyari hetsiemieme, tiratu kakuniyari meta naime Kakaiyari tipiiniteya mitipatsietika muwa xemite'atianiki tukieya mitawewiyanita».
Merikite Rawiri waikawa 'ukiratsititiri yuniwe Tsarumuni kananukakeni tilaitame mayaniki'Ix- aheri kwieyaritsie.
Yunaime kaniwarukuxeireni meta mawari wewiwamete metatsiere rewitsixi.
Hiki rewitsixi mekaniuti'iniatsieni, xeitewi- yari heimana tamamata wiyari memihitikatei, meputipaimerixi xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana'atahalka miriyari (38.000)'ukitsi.
Miki, xeitewiyari heimana nauka miriyari (24.000) meyupaimeti Yawetukieya manuwe mepihiritiariekai uximayatsika, meta 'ataxewi miriyari meputilukai hipattia mepitisikatetikai,
nauka mepihikitikai,hipattia nauka miriyari Yaw hetsiemiemekwikametemepihikitikaikanariteki, Rawiri mitilaitakai nipai'ayumieme.
Hiki Rawiri kaniwarayelitiani memiyupaimekai, Kuhati meta Merari.
Keritsuni nivermama: Rarani meta Tsimi.
Rarani nivermama mepiyuhaikakai: Kehieri puwamatsikatikai, Tsetani meta Kuheri.
Miki mepaki warukiyarima.
Tsimi piwarayezei: Karani.
Tawari Tsimi nivermama yunaukati mepaki: Yakati, Tsitsa, Kehutsi meta Weriya. Miki Tsimi nivermama mepaki. Yakati wamatsika pihikitikai, Tsitsa hutarieka mieme.
Kuhati nivermama mepiyunaukakai: Amirani, Itsaxi, Hewuruni meta 'Utsiheri.

'Amirani nivermama mepaki, 'Aruni meta Muitsexi. 'Aruni meta nuiwarimama mepanayezelyarie mawari memiwewiekaki yemeki nipatsietika, 'ikwa memukutaiyaniki, Yawé hetsiemieme memite'uximayakaki meta Kakaiyari memiwawiiekaki 'aixia muwayuriekaki teiteri.
Muitsexi, tewi Kakaiyari menayezei, meta nivermama mekaniu'iniatsieni Rewi nuiwarimama wahamatia.
Muiteski niwemama nepaki, Keritsuni meta 'Eriyetsexi.
Keritsuni nu'aya matiarieya patia, Tsewuheri.
'Eriyetsexi xeime xeikia payexei yuniwe, Xekawiyaxi patia, miki hirixia waikawa yuniwema puwarayexei.
'Itsaxi nu'aya mexiakanne patia Tserumiti.
Hewuruni nu'aya mexiakanne patia Keriyaxi, hutarieka mieme 'Amariyaxi, hairieka mieme Kahatsieri, naurieka mieme Kekamani.
'Utsiheri nu'aya mexiakanne patia Mikahiyaxi, hutarieka mieme 'Itsiyaxi pittiewakai.
Merari niwemama nepihikitikai Makiri meta Mutsihí. Makiri niwemama nepihikitikai 'Eriyatsaxi meta Kihitsi.
'Eriyatsaxi tiri 'ukitsi kawarayexeiyaka kaniumini: 'ukari xeikia piwarayexei. Miki yatewa yu'iwama menjwarutiwi'ti Kihitsi niwemama.
Mutsihí yuniwema yuhaikanne puwarayexei: Makiri, 'Eraxi meta Keremuti.

'Iki Rewi nuiwariimama mepihiki, niwemama yuxexuiti kememiteyutamiiriyaxi. 'Ana mepakalutsie kemitetewakai walukiyarima. Miki mepite'uximayakai Yawé tukieya manuwe 'amemiyumate xeikia, xeltewiyari heima meutiyuune wiyari xeikia mepexeiyatikatei.
Rawiri niipai kaniutayini: «Kepauka paitti Yawé, 'ixaheritsixi takakaiyari, yuteiterima mepite'uximayakai.»
pikahenyevetseri revitisixi tuki memikutitivveniki meta piinitiarika muwa mawaritsie timieme».
Imatirieka Rawiri kemitiu'aitaxi, yunaiti revitisixi xeiteviyari wiyari memihitika mekanaka'utsieni memiteta'uximayataki,

'Aruni nuiwarimama memiwaparewieniki, Yawé tukieya manuwe memiteta'uximayataki. Takwa nepihiritiariekai meta kiita 'etsimuyeyeyeuta yaxeikia meta nepihiritiariekai pinite mawaritsie timieme memiteti'itiwaniki, meta hipame 'uximayatsika tuki hetsiemieme.

Yaxeikia ta nepihiritiariekai paa Kakaiyari hixie mieme, meta tiriku mitixiyari 'aixia mi'ane hatsite mawariyari hetsiemieme, harina papayari mikakuxanariyarietika meta mawari mitixarikietika mit'etsarietika metatsiere te'ininiatamete naime hepatisita nepihikitikai.
Mepihiritiariekai ximeri meta taikai memi'axeniki pamipariyutsi memipitiakaki meta meminiawaniki Yawé.

Metatsiere mepihiritiariekai mawari tai-yariyari memutiwewiwaniki Yawé hetsiemieme mutiwewiwakai xawatiki meta metseri 'etsimipenitsie meta hipati 'ixiarari maye'axenitsie. Mipai yamekateni'uximayakaitini Yawé hetsiemieme yayupapaimeti, kememite'aitiariekai.
Mipai mepitehiritiariekai 'ixuriki tukiyari memi'iviyaniki meta tuki muyepatsie. Kepauka memite'uximayakai Yawé tukieyata, wa'iwama 'Aruni nuiwarimama yametewarahiawekaku
'Aruni nuiwarimama 'ipai mekateniuyu'uitiani: 'Aruni niwemama mepihiki Narawi,'Awihu, 'Eriyatsaxi meta 'Itamaxi.
Narawi meta 'Awihu mekaniukwini tirimekawarayexeiyawaweti wapaapa kamiwekaku 'akuxi, hiki 'Eriyatsaxi meta 'Itamaxi zeikiarimawari wewiwamete mekanakine.
'Eriyatsaxi nuiwarieya Tsaruki, meta 'Itamaxi nuiwarieya 'Akimereki, miki Rawiri meparewiekaku 'aixia katiniwaru'uitiani mawari wewiwamete kehapai memite'uximayatakekai.

'Eriyatsaxi nuiwarimama wa'ukiyarima memiyuwaikawakai keyuri 'Itamaxi nuiwarimama wa'ukiyarima, 'ipai mekateniwaru'uitiani: Tamamata heimana 'ataxewi mepiyupaimekai 'Eriyatsaxi nuiwarimama wa'ukiyarima, meta 'Itamaxi nuiwarimama wa'ukiyarima 'atahaika mepiyupaimekai.
Yunaiti 'lniariki mekaniupitiarieni 'uximayatsika, yunaiti 'Eriyatsaxi nuiwarimama meta 'Itamaxi nuiwarimama watsata mepanu'ukai 'uximayatsika memakumate tukita mieme meta Kakaiyaritsia mieme.

T'lutiwanne Tsemahiyaxi Natanaheri nu'aya, Rewi nuiwarieya hetsiemieme, miki kaniwaraka'utiani kementietewakaiti'aitame hixie meta 'iparewiwanete, mawari wewiwamete Tsaruki meta 'Akimereki 'Awiyataxi nu'aya, mawari wewiwamete nuiwariyari walukiyarima, meta rewitsizi nuiwariyari walukiyarima wahixie. 'Eriyatsaxi nuiwarimama hutakia mekaniupitiarieni 'iniari, peru 'Itamaxi nuiwarimama heiwamieme xelkia.
'Iniari matiari mieme pitiunakixi Kuyariwi, hutarieka pitiunakixi Kerahiyaxi,
'hairieka pitiunakixi Karini, naurieka pitiunakixi Tsehurini,
'auxiwirieka pitiunakixi Marikiyaxi, 'ataxewirieka pitiunakixi Mikamini,
'atahutarieka pitiunakixi Kuhutsi, 'atahairieka pitiunakixi Awiyaxi,
'atanaurieka pitiunakixi Ketsuha, tamamatarieka pitiunakixi Tsekaniyaxi,
tamamata heimana xewi mieme patia 'Eriyatsiwi, tamamata heimana hutarieka mieme patia Yakini,
tamamata heimana hairieka mieme patia Hupá, tamamata heimana naurieka mieme patia Ketsewa,
tamamata heimana 'auxiwi mieme patia Wirika, tamamata heimana 'ataxewi mieme patia 'Imexi,
tamamata heimana 'atahuta mieme patia Hetsixi, tamamata heimana 'atahaika mieme patia 'Aputsexi,
tamamata heimana 'atanauka mieme patia Kakini, xeitewiyari heimana hutarieka mieme patia Kamuri,
xeitewiyari heimana hutarieka mieme patia Kamuri,
xeitewiyari heimana hairieka mieme patia Rerahiyaxi, xeitewiyari heimana naurieka mieme patia Mahatsiyaxi.
Mipai mekateniuyu'ultiani Yawé tukieyata memiteta'uximayataki, yemeki Yawé 'ixaheritisixi takakaiyari 'Aruni kemirahiawekai, mawari wewiwamete wa'ukiyari.
'Iki Rewi nuiwarimama memuyuhayewaxi memaka'utiarie mepihiki: 'Amirani nuiwarimama Tsuwaheri wa'ukiyari patia, Tsuwaheri nuiwarimama Keheriyaxi wa'ukiyari patia.
Xekawyaxi nuiwarimama 'Itsiyaxi wa'ukiyari patia, miki mimexia kametikai.
'Itsaxi nuiwarimama Tserumuti wa'ukiyari patia, Tserumuti nuiwarimama Yakati wa'ukiyari patia.
Hewuruni nivemama: mexiakame Keriyaxi patia, hutarieka mieme 'Amariyaxi patia, hairieka mieme Kahatsieri patia, naurieka mieme Kekamani
Mikahiyaxi nuiwarimama Tsamixi wa'ukiyari patia,
'Itsiyaxi Mikahiyaxi pi'iwayatikai, 'Itsiyaxi nuiwarimama Tsakariyaxi wa'ukiyari patia,
Merari nuiwarimama Makiri meta Mutsihf wa'ukiyarima nepaki, Wenuhu nuiwarimama Katsiyaxi wa'ukiyari patia.
Merari nuiwarimama hipatita: Katsiyaxi hetsiemiemete: Wenuhu, Tsukani, Tsakuxi meta 'Iwiri.
Makiri hetsiemiemete: 'Eriyatsaxi, miki tir'i pikawarayexei.
Kihitsi hetsiemiemete: nu'aya Kerameri.
Mutsihf niwemama wahetsiemieme: Makiri, 'Eraxi meta Keremuti.

'Iki mepinki rewitsixi wanuiwarima wa'ukiyarima kemeniyutipaimerixi. Yaxelkia yu'iwama 'Aruni nuiwarimama wahepai 'iniariki 'uximayatsika mepupitiarie ti'aitame Rawiri hixie, meta Tsaruki, 'Akimereki meta mawari wewiwamete nuiwariyari wa'ukiyarima meta rewitsixi wa'ukiyarima. 'Amemiyumate meta yaki memiyumate yaxelkia mepitepitiariekai 'uximayatsikaki.
Teyuitiwanete memakine, Rawiri meta kuyaxi tewa'aitiwamete mekaniwaranayexeiya 'Atsahapi niwemama, Hemani meta Kerutuni niwemama, miki Kakaiyari niukieya
'Atsahapi nivennama: Tsakuxi, Kutse, Netaniyaxi meta 'Atsarera. Miki piwakuyuitiwakai 'Atsahapi, meta pitthekiatakai kwikariki ti'aitame Rawiri yarehiawekaku.

Kerutuni nivennama me'ataxewiti: Kerariyaxi, Tseri, Kitsariyaxi, Tsimihi, Katsawiyaxi meta Matatiyaxi. 'Iki wapaapa Kerutuni pitiwa'aitiakai, miki meteyuitiati 'aripaki Yawé niukieya nepinekiatakai meta pamipariyutsi nepipitiakai me'iniawati.
Hemani nivennama: Wukiyaxi, Mataniyaxi, 'Utsiheri, Tsewuheri, Keremuti, Kananiyaxi, Kananihi, 'Erihata, Kirariti, Xumaniti-Etsexi, Kutsiwekatsa, Maruti, Hutixi meta Mahatsihuti.

Miki yunaiti Hemani mepinivennama, ti'aitame hetsiemieme Kakaiyari niukaneya mihikitikai, hiki miki Kakaiyari niukieyaki 'aixia neputiyuanekai tirikariyaya hepatisita. Kakaiyari Hemani tiri peiyeni'airi, tamamata heimana meyunaukame 'ukitsi meta 'ukari yuhaikame.
Miki Yawé tukieyattapaiti wapaapa pitiwaku'ikitiwakai kepauka memutikwikakai mitiuttitiraurikaki, kanariteki meta 'aripaki. 'Atsahapi, Kerutuni meta Hemani, miki kivikamete memihikitiniki.
Yu'uximayatsika mepupitiarie 'iniariki kepauka nemite'ukayultiwani, yunaiti 'etsimemiyumate meta 'amemiyumate meta te'ikitamete metatsiere teyu'iktiiwamete meyunaiti.
Hiki mexiakame pitiunakixi Kutse 'Atsahapi nu'aya, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta mepiyupaimekai,
hutarieka pitiunakixi Kerariyaxi, 'iwamama meta niwemama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta menjyupaimekai.
hairieka pitiunakixi Tsakuxi, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta menjyupaimekai.
naurieka pitiunakixi 'Itsihiri, niwemama meta 'iwamama, meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta menjyupaimekai.
'Auxiwireka pitiunakixi Netaniyaxi, niwe- mama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta menjyupaimekai.
'Ataxewirieka pitiunakixi Wukiyaxi, niwe- mama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta menjyupaimekai.
'Atahutarieka pitiunakixi Ketsarera, niwe- mama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta menjyupaimekai.
'Atanaurieka pitlunakixi Mataniyaxi, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta nepiyupaimekai.
Tamamatarieka pitlunakixi Tsimi, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta nepiyupaimekai.
Tamamata heimana xewi pitlunakixi 'Atsareri, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta nepiyupaimekai.
Tamamata heimana huta pitlunakixi Katsawiyaxi, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta nepiyupaimekai.
Tamamata heimana hairieka pitlunakixi Tsuwaheri, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta nepiyupaimekai.
Tamamata heimana naurieka pitlunakixi Matatiyaxi, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta nepiyupaimekai.
Tamamata heimana 'auxivirieka pitlunakixi Keremuti, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta nepiyupaimekai.
Tamamata heimana 'ataxewirieka pitlunakixi Kananiyaxi, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta nepiyupaimekai.
Tamamata heimana 'atahutarieka pitlunakixi Kutsiwekatsa, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta mepiyupaimekai.
Tamamata heimana 'atahairieka pitlunakixi Kananihi, yuniwema meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta mepiyupaimekai.
Tamamata heimana 'atanaukarieka pitlunakixi Maruti, niwemama meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta mepiyupaimekai.
Xeitewiyaritsie pitlunakixi 'Eriyata, yuni- wema meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta mepiyupaimekai.
Xeitewiyari heimana xewi pitlunakixi Hutixi, yuniwema meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tama- mata heimana huta mepiyupaimekai.
Xeitewiyari heimana huta pitlunakixi Kirariti yuniwema meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tama- mata heimana huta mepiyupaimekai.
Xeitewiyari heimana hairieka pitlunakixi Mahatsihuti, yuniwema meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta mepiyupaimekai.
Xeitewiyari heimana naurieka pitlunakixi Xumaniti-Etsexi, yuniwema meta 'iwamama meyunaiti tamamata heimana huta mepiyupaimekai.
Kitenie tehivemete kennemite'u'ultiarie:
Metseremiyaxi nivennama nepaki: Matiari mieme Tsakariyaxi, hutarieka mieme Keriyalieri, hairieka mieme Tsewariyaxi, naurieka mieme Katinieri
'auxivirieka mieme 'Erami 'ataxewirieka mieme Kuhanahani, 'atahutarieka mieme 'Erihuhenahi.
'Uweri-'Erumi nivemama nepaki: Mexiakame mieme Tsemahiyaxi, hutarieka mieme Kutsawari, hairieka mieme Kuha, naurieka mieme Tsakaxi, 'auxivirieka mieme Natanaheri,
'ataxewirieka mieme 'Amiheri, 'atahutarieka mieme 'Itsakaxi, 'atahairieka mieme Pehuritahi. Kakaiyari 'Uweri-'Erumi 'aixia kaniuyurieni tiri waikawa niwarayezejyaki.
'Uweri-'Erumi nu'aya Tsemahiyaxi mikita tiri piwarayexei, miki nepaki yutiriyama wahetsiemieme memanuyetekai, teiteri memikamama nepihikitikai.
Tsemahiyaxi nivemama nepihikitikai, 'Utini, Xapahiri, 'Uweri, 'Eritsawari meta wa'iwama 'Erihu meta Tsamakiyaxi, miki yunaiti teiteri memikamama nepihikitikai.

Miki yunaiti 'Uweri-'Erumi mepinuiwarinamatikai. Miki meta waniwema kaniwaruhiritiani memite'uximayakaki Xuweni nuiwariinama, Kahari nuiwariinama, meta Manatsexi nuiwariinama hixiapa memi'axe wahetsiemieme, tinaimeki Kakaiyari hetsiemieme meta ti'aitame hetsie timieme.
Metseremiyaxi nivennama meta 'iwamama meyunalti, tamamata heimana 'atahalka mepiyupaimekai, miki teiteri memikamama mepihikitikai.
Kutsa nivennama, Merari nuiwarieya het- siemieme, mepihiki Tsimiri, wa'ukiyari matia (tsepa mikamexiakametikai, peru 'ukiyarieya manuyeka kaneyelitiani),
hutarieka mieme Kirikiyaxi patia, hairieka mieme Tewariyaxi patia meta naurieka Tsakariyaxi. Miki yunaiti Kutsa nivennama meta 'iwamama mepaki tamamata heimana haika.
Meriktie nipai mekateniu'uitiarieni kitenie tehiwemete, memanuyetei meta wa'iwama, Yawé tukieyata memite'uximayakaki.
Kitenie kepauka memitetahinikekai mepupitiarie 'iniariki yuxexulti nuiwarite 'amemiyumate meta 'etsimemiyumate yunaiti.
'Iniariki kememite'upitiarie, Tseremiyaxi pitlunakixi 'itupari tau manatineika hepa meuwie, meta nu'aya Tsakariyaxi, mitimaiwekai mi'ixatsitametikai, pitlunakixi 'itupari tayetatsie meuwie.
'Uweri-'Erumi pitlunakixi kitenie tahetia hep- atsie meuwie, meta nivennama mephiritiarie 'ik- waite mitiuyepine tukita timieme.
Tsupini meta Kutsa matia Tsareketi kite- nie tehivemete.

Xexuime tukaritsie me'ataxewiti rewitsixi tau manatineika hepa meukitenietsie mepu'uwekai, yunaukati tayeta hepatsie, meta yunaukati taheta hepatsie, meta yuhuhutati xexuime 'ikwaite mitiuyepitikatsie mepitehikai.
Takwa tau makayuyuipike hepa mukumatsie yuhutati mepitehikai rewitsixi meta yunaukati miki huyeyari 'utima.
Mipai mekateniu'uitiarieni kitenie tehiwemete Kure meta Merari wanuiwarima.
Hipatita rewitsixi mepite'ihiritiarie tukita timieme pinii miraye'atika meta mitipatsietika Kakaiyari hetsie timieme muwa mitiuyepitikatsie.
Rarani Keritsuni punuiwarieyatikai, Kehieri manuyeka kanayani Rarani nuiwarimama wahetsie.
Kehieri niwemama Tsetani meta Kuheri, miki mepihiritiarie piinite miraye'atika Yawé tukita timieme.

Tsewuheri, Keritsuni nuiwarieya Muitsexi nu'aya, miki tumini hiwemete wa'ukiyari pihikitikai yunalme wahetsiemieme, 'Amirani nuiwarimama, 'Itsaxi nuiwarimama, Hewuruni nuiwarimama meta 'Utsiheri nuiwarimama.
'Eriyetsexi nuiwarimama ke-memite'unuiwaxi, Xekawyaxi, Kitsariyaxi, Kurani, Tsikiri meta Tserumiti.

Tserumiti meta 'iwamama mepuhiritiarie piinite mitipatsietika hipati memiteyetua, tikatame Rawiri, meta nuiwarite wa'ukiyarima, meta kuyaxi xeimiriyari meta xeitsienituyari tewa'aitivamente meta hipati kuyaxi tewa'aitivamente.
Miki mepiteyetuakai piinitiarika kuyaxa memiteha'iwakai, kimana Yawé tukieya 'aixia muku'tiarieniki.
Tserumiti meta 'iwamama mepihiritiariekai, Tsamuheri Kakaiyari niukaneya mitiyetua, Tsahuri Kihitsi nu'aya mitiyetua, meta 'Awinexi Nexi nu'aya meta Kuhawi Tsariwiya nu'aya memiteyetua.
Kenaniyaxi meta nivemama, 'Itsaxi meminuiwarinnama, miki mepi'itsuka tetikai ti'aitame mepiparewiekai 'aixia mepite'akayuruwakai naime 'uxi matiarikatsie 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie.

Katsawiyaxi meta maremama, miki Hewuruni nuiwarinama mepihikitikai, xeimiriyari heimana 'atahuta tsienituyari mepikikitikai teiteri memikamama. Miki Kurutani 'anutaiye tau makayuyuipike hepa 'ixaheritsixi watsata mepite'uximayakai Yawé hetsiemieme meta ti'aitame hetsiemieme.

Hewuruni nuiwarinama wa'ukiyari Keriyaxi pihikitikai. Huta tewiyari wiyari Rawiri ti'aitakaku, kaneutixeiyariexiani Hewuruni nuiwarieya xapayari, mekaniutaxeiyarieni Katsexi kiekariyaritsie Karaha kwieyaritsie teiteri memikamama.
Miki teiteri memikamama Yuxexulti nuiwarite kemiane kitenieyaritsie memite'unakixi mana mekatenihikaitini yayupapaimeti.

Ikimekanihikitini kemente'aka'utiarie xapatsienuiwarite wa'ukiyarima, xelmiriyari metaxeitsientiuyarikuyaximemitewa'altia, metatilaitameparewiwametemannakuyaxi 'ixaheritsiximeminiritiariekai. Xeikuyaxiyari mepiyupapaimekai xeitewiyari heimana nauka miriyari, mikimepite'utahivekaixeimetseri xeiwiyaritsietilaitamehetsiemieme.
Matiari metseritsiemiemete kuyaxi, xeitewiyari heimana nauka miriyari memiyupaime, wa'ukiyari pihikitikai Yatsuwehani Tsawirieri nu'aya,
Paretsinuivarieya hetsiemieme. Miki wa'ukiyari pihikitikai yunaimekuyaxi memiwani'a mexiakamemetseritsiememite'uta'uximayatakai.
Hutarieka metseritsiemiemete kuyaxi, xeitewiyari heimana naukaniriyari memiyupaime, Ruralni 'Akuki niuivarieya hetsiemieme, mikimanuvekapihikitikai. Miki wa'ukiyari Mikuruti pititewakai.
Hairieka metseritsiemiemete kuyaxi xeitewiyari heimana naukaniriyari memiyupaime,
Wenahiyaxi xeitewiyari heimana tamamata kuyaxi memikamama puwanikai, meta miki muwani'a pihikitikai. Miki nu'aya 'Amitsawari hairieka netseritsie miemete wahamatia payewekai.
Naurieka netseritsie miemete kuyaxi xeitewiyari heimana nauka niriyari memiyupaine, 'Atsaheri muwani'a pihikitikai, Kuhawi 'iwaya. 'Arike hetsiena mieme kananukakeni nu'aya Tsewariyaxi.
'Auxiwirieka netseritsie miemete kuyaxi xeitewiyari heimana nauka niriyari memiyupaine, Tsamuti 'Itsiraha kiekame muwani'a pihikitikai.
'Ataxewirieka netseritsie miemete kuyaxi xeitewiyari heimana nauka niriyari memiyupaine, 'Ira muwani'a pihikitikai 'Iketsi Tekuha kiekame nu'aya.
'Atahutarieka netseritsie miemete kuyaxi xeitewiyari heimana nauka niriyari memiyupaine, Heretsi muwani'a pihikitikai Peruni kiekame 'Epirahini nuiwarieya.
'Atahairieka netseritsie miemete kuyaxi xeitewiyari heimana nauka niriyari memiyupaine, Tsivekahi Kutsa kiekame muwani'a pihikitikai, Tsera nuiwarieyatsie mieme.
'Atanaurieka netseritsie miemete kuyaxi xeitewiyari heimana nauka niriyari
Tamamata netseritsie mieme, Marahi Netupa kiekame muwani'a pihikitikai, mikita piwarexeiyakai xeitewiyari heimana nauka miriyari, Tsera nuiwarieya hetsiemieme.
Tamamata heimana xewi netseritsie miemete, muwani'a pihikitikai Wenahiyaxi Piratuni kiekame, 'Epirahini nuiwarieya hetsiemieme, mikita piwarexeiyakai xeitewiyari heimana nauka miriyari.
Tamamata heimana huta netseritsie miemete, Kerirahi Netupa kiekame muwani'a pihikitikai, 'Utunieri nuiwarieya hetsiemieme, mikita xeitewiyari heimana nauka miriyari piwarexeiyakai.

Meriktie 'ikita mepihiki 'Ixaheri nuiwarimama wa'ukiyarima memaki: Xuweni nuiwarimama wabetsiemieme: 'Eriyetsexi Tsikiri nu'aya muwani'a pihikitikai, Tsimehuni nuiwarimama wabetsiemieme: Tsepatiyaxi Mahaka nu'aya muwani'a pihikitikai,
Rewi nuiwarimama wabetsiemieme: Katsawiyaxi Kemuheri nu'aya muwani'a pihikitikai, 'Aruni nuiwarimama wabetsiemieme: Tsaruki muwani'a pihikitikai,
Kura nuiwarimama wabetsiemieme: 'Erihú Rawiri 'Iwaya muwani'a pihikitikai, 'Itsakaxi nuiwarimama wabetsiemieme: 'Umiri Mikaheri nu'aya muwani'a pihikitikai,
Tsawuruni nuiwarimama wahetsiemieme: 'Itsimahiyaxi 'Awiriyaxi nu'aya muwania pihikitikai, Nepitaharī nuiwarimama wahetsiemieme: Kerimutī 'Atsirieri nu'aya muwania pihikitikai,
'Epirahini nuiwarimama wahetsiemieme: 'Utseyaxi 'Atsatsiyaxi nu'aya muwania pihikitikai, hīxiata me'atī Manatsexi xiiyarimama wahetsiemieme: Kuherī Perahiyaxi nu'aya muwania pihikitikai,

Tawarita hīxiata me'atī Manatsexi nuiwarimama Karaha kwieyariīsie memittiekai wahetsiemieme: Truhu Tsakariyaxi nu'aya muwania pihikitikai, Wenikamini nuiwarimama wahetsiemieme: Katsiherī 'Awinexi nu'aya muwania pihikitikai,
Rani nuiwarimama wahetsiemieme: 'At-sareri Keruhanī nu'aya muwania pihikitikai. 'Iki mepihikitikai 'Ixaherī nuiwarimama meniwaniakai.
Peru Rawirī pikawarakalūta 'ukitsi xeiteviyari wiyari memikahexeiyakai, mikī Yawē mipai putayikai kename 'ixaheritsixi mekayu'inistsiniakakekai, miyuawitsie miemete xirawetsixi wahepai.
Kuhawi Tsariwiya nu'aya kantisuttani warrakalūtianike, peru yunaime pikawarakalūtia Kakaiyari muyehalaki 'ixaheritsixi wahetsiemieme. 'Ayumieme kememiyupaimekai

Miraye'atika mitiuyepine tilaitame tipiinileya pihiritiariekai 'Atsimaweti 'Arieri nu'aya. Kunatani 'Utsiyaxi nu'aya pithiritiariekai watsiyata timieme, kiekartetsie timieme, kiekari 'etsimiyeyeutsie timieme meta kiekarite kuraru 'amatietewa mexelyatikatsie timieme.
Menukaletsa niwani'a 'Etsiri pihikitikai Keruwi nu'aya.
Tsimi Xamati kiekame pihiritiariekai kaxie haraweriyarite. Tsawiri Tsepani kiekame pihiritiariekai winu miti'utaki kita.
Wahari-Kanani Kerexi kiekame pihiritiariekai huriwa haraweriyarite meta xapa 'iteiriyarite Tsepera yemuriyaritetsie mieme. Kuhatsi pihiritiariekai hatselti miwa'utsie.
Tsitirahi Tsaruni kiekame wakaitsizi pihiritiariekai Tsaruni kvieyaritsie memu'uwakai. Tsapati 'Arurahi nu'aya wakaitsixi pihiritiariekai mayeweveritsie memiye'uwakai.
'Uwiri 'Itsimaheri nuiwarieya kameyutsixi pihiritiariekai. Keheriyaxi merunuttianaka mikita puxuri 'ukari pihiritiariekai.
Katsitsi Hakaxi nuiwarieya muxatsi pihiritiariekai. 'Iki yunaiti mekanihikitikaitini tilaitame pareviwanetemama tipiinileya
Kunatani Rawiri tatatsieya, tiluitwame mitimalwekai, tilaitame izatsiitwameya pihikitikai. Kehieri Kakumuni nu'aya piwa'iwiyakai tilaitame niwemama.
'Aktuperi miktatisiere tilaitame izatsiitwameya pihikitikai. Hutsahi 'araki tewiyari tilaitame 'aixia mitimate pihikitikai.
Kuyara Wenahiyaxi nu'aya meta 'Awiyataxi 'arike 'Aktuperi hetsiemieme nepanukalui. Kuhawi kuyaxi yunaime wa'ukiyari pihikitikai.

Merikitsi Rawiri Kerutsaremetsie kaniwarukuxeirieni: yunalme Ixaheri nuiwarimama memiwani'a, yunalme kuyaxi memiwani'a xeimetseri memite'utahiwekai, xeimiriyari meta xeitsienituyari memihiritiarietikatei, meta t'airame tipiinieya memitehiritiariekai, tewamama memiwahikai meta niwemama, paratsiyu memihiritiariekai, kuyaxi memeuyutakwiwawc meta kuyaxi memikamama.

Kananukukeni ti'aitame Rawiri mipai kaniutayini: Ne'iwamarixi xekeneneu'eni. Ne mipai nepitiku'eriwakai tuki nepitawewienikekai, muwa Yawetakakaiyari tiratnya kakuniyari mayekaniki meta muwa mayeyeriniki Kakaiyari. Tinaimeri nepitiuxeiriekai mitawewiereki,
peru Kakaiyari mipai pinetiutahiawixi:"Tuki 'eki pepikanetsitawewirieni,'ekitsi kuya yumemiwame pekanilhikitini meyuwaikawame pekaniwarukwini".

Merikite Yawé 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya, ne'iwama watsata pinetsi'anayexei 'Ixaheritsie munetsi'anukakeniki nemittia'aitaki yuheyemeki. Mikitsi Kura nuiwariyari kananayexeiya te'aitamete nuiwariyari memakineki, miki nuiwaritsie penayexei nenuiwari, meta ne'iwama watsata ne pinetsi'anayexei, 'Ixaheritsie ti'aitame nemayaniki.
Meta neniwema nemiyimire Yawé minetsi'upitia watsata, neniwe Tsarumuni panayexei Yawé 'uwenieyatsie mayeriniki 'ixaheritsixi mitiwata'aitianiki.
Kakaiyari mipai pinetiutahiawixi: "Tsarumuni 'aniwe kaniyianemiki tuki mitawewieni meta kuraru.yari, ne nepenayexei neniwe pihikitini neta 'ukiyarieya nepihikitini.
Xika yatikamieni ne'iniari niukiyaritsie meta kenemiti'aita, hiki kemitikamie, hiki 'ana nepipitiani yuheyemeki miti'aitaniki".

Kakaiyari mitatsi'enie hixie, meta yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi Yawé teiterimama xemihiki, nepixehiritia yaxemitekahuniki naime 'iniari niukiyaritsie Yawé takakaiyari kemiti'aita. Xika mipai xetekakine 'iki kwie witsimiraku'anetsie kepu'uwani meta xeniwema wahetsiemieme payani yuheyemeki.

Eki Tsarumuni neniwe kena'eriwani 'alukiyari Kakaiyarieya. Meta kenayexeiyani naime 'aliyariki meta 'aixia 'anemeki 'a'eriwameki. Kariki Yawé 'iyari kanixeiyani meta naime 'iyaritiarika kanimalka. Xika pe'ttiwauni, pimatsipitiani pemitaxeiyaki, mexika pe'tku'eirieni yuheyemeki kamaniku'eirimiki.
Pepikaratitimaiyani Yawé kemimaranayexei tuki pemitawewirieniki muyepatsie mayaniki hetsiena mieme. 'Ayumieme keneyuwariyani 'ari ketine'uximayaka».

Hiki Rawiri Tsarumuni kaniyetuirieni tuki 'iniariyari kemitiwewierekekai meta kiite 'auriena mawetikatel, tatsiari tuki kitenie hixie kii 'etsimipe mukuwewiere, kii mirewati'utsiwa, kii yuheima ma'u, kii kemuyepaimeni kekai taitana, meta muyepatsie tiratu kakuniyari kanamikiyari miwayuhayewatsie.

Meta kaniyetuirieni kemitiyinikekai Yawé tukieya takwayaritsie kemitiku'eriwakai, meta kii mawetika kemi'ayumiemetiniki, tumini tukita mieme hepaitsita meta hakewa mireti'utsiwani pinitte mitipatsietika tukita timieme.
Metatsiere, kaniyetuirieni mawari wewiwamete meta rewitsiki kememite'uximayatakekai, meta piinite mitipatsietika muwa mitiyepikai kemi'ayumiemetinikekai Yawé tukita.
Yaxeikiata, huru 'anayuhayewame kaniyetuirieni meta pirata mititiwewiyaniki pinitte tukita timieme xexuime 'uximayatsikatsie timieme.
Metatsiere kantii'iniatisirieni huru meta pirata kixeme 'uitiwame mitiwewiereki meta kixemeya, kepaimeti miyinikekai huruki mitiwewieri meta pirataki mitiwewiere, xexuiti hakewa mi'ayumiemetikai.
Metatsiere kantii'iniatisirieni huru meta pirata mexa paa maname hetsiemieme, huru mitiwiriyarieni hetsiemieme meta pirata mitiwiniyarieni.

Meta kaniyetuirieni huru 'aixia mi'ane, tiltipiyame manuxite 'amupapa mitiwewiyaniki meta watsu 'aminene metatsiere xarite. Kaniti'inistsirieni 'aye'akame huru meta pirata xexuime tekixitetsie mieme kepaimeti miyinikekai huru meta pirata.

Mexa 'ikwa taiyame hetsiemieme kaniyetuirieni huru 'aixia mi'ane. Metatsiere kaniyetuirieni ke'aneti mitawewierekekai Yawé kaxetaya, tatsiari Kakaiyari testamentmanayu'anateki Yawé tiratnya kakuniyari memanukanakai.
Rawiri mipai kaniutayini: «'Iki tinaiti katinakalutiarieni Yawé yatiutahekiataku, yanemiretimaniki keti'aneneti mititiwewiyani».

Meta mipai Rawiri yuniwe Tsarumuni katiniutahiave: «Kenetirikaiyeni meta ketinayu'iwani, hikiri ketine'uximayaka. Pepikamaka meta pepikayuweranariyani, kariki Kakaiyari Yawé, nekakaiyari, 'ahamatia kaniuyeikamiki. Pikamatsiku'eirieni pikamatsinutuita kepaukake tuki peminini.

Pepiwarexeiya mawari wewiwamete meta rewitsixi memitetaluximayata Kakaiyari tukieyata. Metatsiere pewarexeiyati pepayani kemiane memiyuwairiya yikimana waikawa memitelakumate tinaine 'uximayatsika hepaitsita. Nuiwarite memiwani'a meta yunaiti teiteri mepimatsiparewieni».

Rawiri tilaitame memiyuxeiriekai mipai katiniwarutahiawe: «Kakaiyari neniwe Tsarumuni kananayexeiya, peru miki 'akuxi pikarakumate 'uximayatsika pinariwe. Iki tuki 'amipa tewi pikatipiinieya, matsi Kakaiyari Yawé pita katinipiinieyatini.

Waikawameki neyuwairiyati nekatiniukuhdarita Kakaiyari tukieya hetsiemieme. Piinite tukita timieme mititiwewiyaniki nekatiniuxeirieni, huru, pirata, wurunitse, tepia, kiyexi, meta waikawa 'unitse teteyari, tetexi 'ixurikitsie mikayatsariwa, tetexi miherikarietika witsimutiytika, tetexi witsimi'anene yutsata meta waikawame marimuri teteyari.
Ketipaimeme nemitiukuxeiriekai miki nekati'iniatati, nekakaiyari tukieya nenaki'erieti nepiyetuani tuki hetsiemieme naime huru meta pirata nemeixeiya:

xeitsienituyari miriyari kiruyari pirahetekai huru 'Upixi mieme, meta huta tsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari heimana tamamata miriyari kiruyari raheteme pirata 'aixia mi'ane, mikiki tuki muwakuwiriyarieniki,
piinite huruki mititiwewiereki meta pirataki, metatsiere tsepa tita memite'utiwewi tepiaki te'uximayatanete. ¿Kemi'aneta hiki xeme 'imikieri piyetuani Yawé hetsiemieme?»

Hiki 'ukirawetsixi yutiriyama memiwareuxeiya, 'Ixaheri nuiwarimama memiwani'a, xeimiriyari kuyaxi memiwani'a meta xeitsienituyari kuyaxi memiwani'a metatsiere tilaitame 'uximayatsikaya memihiritiariekai, miki 'imikieri mekaniyetuani kennemiteheuysuvavekai.

Miki mekaniyetuani Kakaayari tukieya hetsiemieme mititiwewiyaniki, xeitsienituyari heimana haika teviyari heimana 'auxiwi miriyari (165.000) kiruyari raheteme meta tamamata miriyari huru tuminiyari, haika tsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari heimana tamamata (330.000) kiruyari raheteme huru, 'ataxewi tsienituyari miriyari kiruyari raheteme wuruniise tepiayari, meta haika miyuniyari heimana haika tsienituyari kiruyari raheteme tepia.
Kemiane tetexi memeixeiyakai witsimi'anene mekaniyetiani Kehieri hetsia, miki Keritsuni niuwarieya pihikitikai, mekaniyetuani Yawé tukieyata mieme mirayaniki.
Hiki yunaiti kiekatari waikawa mekaniyutemanawiekaitini memiyiwawekaiki memiyetuani 'imikieri Yawé hetsiemieme, yaxelkia ti'aitame Rawiri waikawa kaniyutemawiekaitini.
Merikite Rawiri Yawé 'aixia katiniutahiawe yunaime teiteri wahixie, nipai 'utaiti: «'Aixia peketikihiawarivvani Yawé, ta'ukiyari 'Ixaheri Kakaayarieya, yemeki yuheyemeki.
Eki Yawé katini'apinitini, kepemitimarive meta kepemititirikaiye, witsikepemi'ane, kepemirayu'iwa meta kepemiti'aitame.
Ahetsia xikutiriya payeneika meta 'aixia mitl'ane, 'eki yunaime pekatini'aitani. Ahetsie puxuawe tirikariya meta miyivveniki, meta 'eki pepihiki mariweme pemirayeltiani meta yunaime pemuwatirikariya.
Ayumieme,takakaiyari,pampariyutsi tepimatsipitia, metawitsipemi'anetsiemieme'aixia tepatitka.

Peru,ne tixaiti nepikatihiki meta neteiterima tixaiti nepikatehiki, tita meta 'imikieri temateye- tuiri tixaiti pikatihiki. Yurikitsi 'eki, tinaiti 'apilni katinihikitini, tame ketita temateyetuiri, miki ka- tinihikitini 'eki pemitatiyetuiri.
Ahixie tame,ku'uwanete tekanihikitini meta kikamete, ta'ukiyarima memi'anekai hepai meri- paiti.Tatukari 'ena kwiepa 'etiri hepai kani'aneni mikareutetere.
Yawetakakaiyari,lkinaitiketita temite'ukuxeirituki temitawewieniki 'ahetsiemieme,eki peptiatiupitia.Naiti piti'apilni.

Nekakaiyari 'aku,ne nepitimate 'eki 'iyartte pepixeiya kemitiku'eriwa meta pepinaki'erie titamitiheitserie.Ayumieme netayari hetiseriekaku nematiyetuiri 'iki naime piinite, meta nepiwaruxei ateiterima meyutemanawieti kememite'iyetua yumawari kememiteyuwarriya.
Yawetalukiyarima wakakaiyari 'Apirahami,Itsahaki metaIxaheri,hiki hepai meteyikihiaweme keniwapitiaka wa'iyaritsie yuheyemeki, miki yu'iyaritsie nemimatsiha'eriwaniki keniwapitiaka.

Yaxelkiata neniwe Tsarumuni keneupitia 'iyari 'aixia tiyikihiaweme, yamitikanieniki meta yamitiyurieneniki 'a'aitsikatsie meta 'a'iniari niukiyari naimetsie. Keneupitia tuki mitawewieniki hetsiena timieme nemitiukuha'aritaxi».

Hiki Rawiri yunaime teiteri nipai katiniwarutahiawe: «Yawé xekeneniawani yukakaiyari». Hiki yunaiti teiteri Yawé mekaniutaniawa, yu'ukiyarima wakakaiyari, meta Yawé hixie mekaniukahixima'uni metatsiere ti'aitame hixie.

Hiki 'uxa'arieka, Yawé mekaniyetuirieni waikawa mawari meta mawari taiyariyari, yunaime 'ixaheritsixi wahetsiemieme: xeimiriyari turutsixi temari, xeimiriyari muxatsi 'ukitsi meta xeimiriyari muxatsi 'etsimemipepe, winu mawariyari heutinitikaime, meta waikawa hipame mawari.

Miki tukaritsie mepite'ukwai meta mepite'anu'i meyutemannavieti Yawé hixie. Hiki 'ana hutarieka teiteri Tsarumuni ti'aitame mayaniki yamekaniutiyuani Rawiri nu'aya, Yawé hixie hatseiti mu'uyatsie mekanikawirieni ti'aitame mayaniki, meta Tsaruki mekaniukawirieni mawari wewiwame mayaniki.
Hiki Tsarumuni Yawé 'uwenieya hetsie muyuawitsie meta kwiepa.
Yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi walukiyarima, kuyaxi waikawa meniyiwawe meta tilaitame Rawiri niwemama yamekaniutiyuani 'aixia 'anemeki memiparewieniki tilaitame Tsarumuni.
Yawé mariweme kanayeitiani Tsarumuni naitsarie 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie, meta kanipitiani mitilaitaniki mariwemeki mariwati, nixewiti mikareixeiyakai hepai telaitamete 'Ixaheritsie memanukalui.
Rawiri 'Itsahi nu'aya katinluta'aita naitsarie 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie.

Naimeki, pitluta'aitaxi huta tewiyari wiyari 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie: Hewuruni pukatei tilaitati 'atahuta wiyari, meta Kerutsareme 'ukaiti pitluta'aitaxi xeltewiyari heimana tamamata heimana haika wiyari.
Hiki kaniumini waikawa 'ukiratsititiri, 'aixia raniuwakaku hetsiena mieme meta waikawa xilkutiti, nu'aya Tsarumuni hetsiena mieme katinluta'aita.

Naime Rawiri kemitiuyuri, mitilutsuttatsie meta 'imatirieka kemitiuyuri, kemitluta'aitaxi kemittirikaiyekai, meta kemitiyuri, 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie kemitiuyi meta kiekari 'auriena namanetikatsie, naiti katinaka'utiarieni kemitiuyi xapayaritetsie mitaniere Tsamuheri meka'utiatsie, Kakaiyari niukanneya Natani hiki tilaitakaku naiti 'aixia katinluyini. Yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi yamekatenikahukaitini kemainekai.
